It is suspenseful, action-packed and full of sensual encounters.  The inhumane way the cyborgs are handled by their engineers is harsh and daunting.  While on a battleship in another galaxy a cyborg's hatred for humans is put to the ultimate test when he meets his new engineer, Joan.  Joan is the first and only female engineer and the men on the station won't accept her.  This is the story of Rage and Joan and how love can conquer all!From the beginning I was captured by Joan's ability to calm and bring peace.  She was from an Agri, farming community, that was destroyed in the war.  Her family was killed and a cyborg saved her.  She swore she would pay it forward and dedicated her life to helping the cyborgs.  She studied hard and excelled at the academy and was placed on a battleship ready to service the cyborg she would be paired with.  The commander did not want a female aboard his ship and allowed cruel and mean attacks on Joan.  She lived daily in fear.  When she finally is given a cyborg to pair with she is taken aback when Rage is presented to her.  He has been sorely abused by his previous engineers and loathes humans.  He killed his last one!This story is about trust and forgiveness and a sexy hot cyborg finding his heart.  I loved the buildup of trust the author developed between the couple and the yearning for acceptance of something neither understood but wanted.  The secondary characters were important in providing pivotal information about the story.  This is a must read for sci-fi romance followers and a welcome addition to anyone's eBook library.  I look forward to the next encounter from this fabulous author and her sexy world of cyborgs!

Overall Rating:  4.25 Rockin’ ★★★★Powerful in her own right, the talented journalist Olivia Lilyfield stumbles upon an attack and rushes to help the snarling wounded wolf in Jaxson, the first book of the River Pack Wolves series by Alisa Woods.  After saving the wolf she meets his human side, Jaxson River the sexiest man she has ever met.  This is a story of intrigue, espionage and the kindling of a fiery romance between our main couple, Jaxson and Olivia.Jaxson River is a former SEAL and the alpha of his pack.  He was cursed by a witch and has no liking for their kind.  When Olivia stumbles upon him in an ally he knows their paths will cross again.  He can't seem to get the woman off his mind.  Olivia Lilyfield yearns to be a worthy journalist.  After her parent’s death, she became a ward of the state.  Striving daily to be better herself she works hard to be more than just a good reporter.  When the opportunity presents itself to be an assistant at Jaxson's company, she takes it even knowing she can never have a relationship with Jaxson, her boss.This is a great beginning to the series.  I really enjoyed the camaraderie between the brothers and their pack and the bond they shared and look forward to reading the next installment in the series.

Overall Rating:  4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆Finally! I mean every other shifter in the Ashe, Borlanders, Gray Back and Lowlander Silverback crews have mated and are happy while Damon Daye the dragon shifter and watcher over all maintains his lonely existence.  I've craved a happy ending for him and the wonderful T.S. Joyce has given it to us in Immortal Dragon! This is a must read book for followers of paranormal romance.Damon's immortality has left him grieving and alone, going through the motions of daily living but not quite feeling alive.  He has buried loved ones and doesn't allow anyone close to him.  His past is haunted and his future is bleak until Mason delivers Clara a bear shifter to his door.  Clara is one feisty red-headed dominant grizzly bear and when she meets Damon sparks ignite and fire begins to burn.  The intense yearning magnifies as they get to know each other and the stories from their past emerge.  An enemy that he long thought dead, rises, seeking revenge and the world is not a safe place if Damon is defeated.T.S. Joyce is an amazing storyteller and Immortal Dragon is my all-time favorite book! The emotions that are evoked through her writing entertain not only the heart but the soul too.  This is another marvelous addition to my expanding library.

Overall Rating:  4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆Hidden secrets in a small logging town are at the center of a sixteen year old mystery that saturates Tess Oliver's newest novel, Physical Distraction with suspense. The reader is pulled immediately into the life of the town's bad boy, Jem Wolfe. The arrival of a sheltered flower-child from the Grog, a compound of artisan hippies living and communing with nature, adds to the clandestine secrets of the town and its inhabitants.  Tashlyn Younglove was searching for answers about her father's accidental death in a small town called Blackthorn Ridge. Jem Wolfe and his family are notoriously known as trouble in this small community. His character develops before your eyes into a multi-dimensional entity as you read his and Tashlyn’s story. This is the path they take together to find peace, happiness, and love in an uncertain world.Tash couldn't remember details about her life when she was found by a park ranger, cold and hungry.  She needed answers and decides to find out what had happened when she was a young child of seven.  Riding a bus to Blackthorn she meets Everly and they become fast friends.  Everly invites her to stay with her while she is in Blackthorn.  When Tash meets Jem Wolfe after being warned to stay clear of him and his brother Dane, she learns there are many different sides to this complex man.  Jem is intrigued by the girl he's dubbed "Woodstock" but still warns her that this town is not for her and she needs to leave.  The more time they spend together the more the attraction between them grows and Jem knows he will do whatever it takes to keep Tash safe.The mystery behind her father's death and Jem's father's past collide into a story you do not want to miss! Not knowing who the real villain is or where the next strike will come from, attests to the grip this author has on the reader.  The knowledge of the mysterious disappearances of young girls adds another element of tension to the storyline.  Tess Oliver masterfully weaves suspense and romance together, creating an unforgettable read that will satisfy anyone that craves a novel filled with mystery, intrigue and passion.  From my perspective, this is a must read and a great addition to my library.

Overall Rating: 4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆Who you gonna call when trouble comes a knockin'? Call KGI they are always on the job.  In this explosively exciting novel by Maya Banks, After the Storm book 8, the Kelly brothers are fighting for truth, justice, family and the American way of life.  In this book, Donovan Kelly finally gets his story.  Although it's through unlikely circumstances, he meets the beautifully broken Eve and knows without a doubt that this girl is his.  The characters that are in play help to create the bold and audacious events, as the plot thickens in a way that only the Kelly's are known for.Donovan Kelly is a computer genius, with all the skills of a kick ass ex-marine.  Being one of the founding brothers of KGI, there missions take them to places no one else wants to go.  Donovan has always had a soft spot for women and children more so than the rest of his brooding brothers, but it doesn’t make him any softer than the rest.  When he finds a woman and two kids in trouble, there’s no doubt what he has to do.  But this time it’s personal…this time his heart is breaking in two for the little family that has come into his life.  Donovan Kelly will stop at nothing to keep them safe, give them hope, and make them his!Eve is running for her life, the life of her brother and baby sister’s as well.  She had to flee, had to save them from the abuse, the monster that was their father.  Broken down in a small town in Kentucky, everything began to change for them.  They met the Kelly family and most of all Donovan Kelly.  Someone she could fall in love with.  But that wasn’t a choice.  Her choices were few and far between.  Run and keep running, never get caught, her small families lives depended upon it.  However, when tragedy strikes, there is no choice but to trust Donovan and hope for the best.Like everything else that Maya Banks creates, Donovan’s story is yet another work of art.  Maintaining the intricacies of the KGI series, with a beautifully woven love story of trust, exploration and passion.  Out of all the Kelly brothers, Donovan was the one I was looking forward to reading the most.  His character always being so passionate and protective, it was a thrill for him to finally get his HEA!  This book as well as the rest of the KGI series is a must read!  Add it to you list today!

Overall Rating:  4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆A monster can come in many forms; a killer, a rapist, or even a normal person who succumbs to the darkness within.  However, in Alice K. Wayne's second book in The Breed series, Nora's Choice, we see that not every monster is bad, looks can be deceiving.  Sometimes the scariest looking creatures can be protectors, fighters against evil, even lovers.  The author has created a world full of vampires and werewolves, a.k.a. The Breed.  While giving us a magical world of paranormal, she enlightens our hearts and souls with a beautiful love story.Nora has been a part of the Breed for the past 100 years.  Until recently she kept herself locked up tight surrounded only by ones she trusted the most.  Her being turned into a Breed wasn't a thing of beauty or desire, but out of hatred and malice, not something wanted.  Tainted by her past, Nora has kept herself in check never wanting a mate, never wanting to surrender to any man ever again.  Or to feel the helplessness that could destroy her again.  Until she meets Quinn Roberts and discovers that he is her true mate.  But can Nora find the peace that comes with a mate?Quinn Roberts is part of the Breed.  He never felt like he belonged anywhere until he meet his pack mates and made the hard decision of becoming one of them.  Not that his family wasn't awesome, he just needed something for himself.  After deciding to become part of the Breed, he and his pack mates were captured by Hunters.  Tortured, experimented on and some were killed ruthlessly.  Turned into a "monster" by Breed standards, Quinn was able to escape and vowed vengeance against every Hunter that crossed his path.  When Quinn is found and reconnects with his family and the Breeds, there is another who he longs for.  Nora is his mate.  Not understanding much about being part of the Breed, Quinn knows without a doubt that she was made just for him.  But he will have to tread lightly to win over the hardened Nora, because her heart is so delicate that unless handled with care she will break.This is an awesome story of passion, angst with mystical beauty.  I was totally engaged from the beginning to end and when I did get to the end...I wanted more!  Quinn and Nora's story was so much more than just a typical love story.  The depth of each character’s creation as well as their emotional turmoil was perfectly drafted.  I'm looking forward to the next exploit in the Breed series.  Will it be Memphis, Sebastian, or Remy?  I can't wait to find out!!  I'm hooked Alice!

Overall Rating: 4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆What would you do to save the ones you love?  When family means everything to you!  Would you make the ultimate sacrifice, take it to the point of no return? Martyr your very soul!  In A. C. Bextor’s continuation of her first book Dirty in the Vengeance Duet series, she unveiled a world of horrific cruelty, human trafficking and the hidden domain of the real 100% MC that left her readers gasping. From the beginning of book two, Truth the story unfolds with even more twist added to the plot.  You will not want to miss one word in this remarkable journey of Max and Emilyn as they search for a way to find Truth and redemption!Max knew from the start that Emma was the one, but he also felt that she was too good for him. Emotions and instincts he had no idea were a part of the man he really is, kicked in when he was faced not only with Emilyn but also the child held captive, Casey.  A connection was formed that called to him to take whatever steps that were needed to rescue her and keep her safe.  Max finds himself walking a dangerous precipice, one that could cost him his very life.  His vow to avenge his sister’s murder is a specter that refuses to release him and haunts his dreams as he pursues a way to save Casey and keep Emma safe.The majority of this romantic suspense novel is told from Max’s POV and gives insight into the essence of this extraordinary character while telling of his unbelievable search and rescue mission.  Ms. Bextor has created a hero in this book, that you will find hard to forget and wish it was possible to meet him in the real world!  Max is everything a true alpha male should be.  He is protective, caring and strong while still gentle as he puts those he loves above everything else. The realism and exposure of the horrors of human trafficking and corruption by those involved by this multi-talented author is so uniquely presented, that it is like looking through a window into that world! Once again A.C. Bextor spins a web of romantic intrigue and happily ever after that you will want to make a part of your must read list!

Overall Rating: 5 Rockin’ ★★★★★Absolution, an act of absolving, a freeing from blame or guilt.  It's something that a lot of us long for or need, whether in a small or a monumental way.  In Rachel Blaufeld's newest book in the Crossroads series, Absolution Road, she takes us on a journey of grace and liberation.  This excursion brings to life Jake and Aly's story.  Jake is Lane's twin brother from the previous story, Redemption Lane.  We are visited by Lane and Bess as well as some of the other characters we know and loved in prior books.Jake Wrigley is messed up.  On the outside everyone sees muscles and a pretty face.  On the inside, deep down in the very depths of his soul he knows he's no good!  Jake has felt this way since his parent’s death. He blames himself because it was his fault.  Sure he's successful in his gym business.  Thanks in part to his brother.  But it's hard for him to get close to anyone, because he doesn't feel he deserves a happily ever after.  That is the way he felt until he meets Alyson Road one Christmas Eve.  Fate seems to play a part in this meeting and everything begins to change for Jake.Alyson Road is an up and coming public defender.  Coming from nothing, she always watches out for the underdog or someone being taken advantage of, even if it causes her unrelenting trouble.  Everyone deserves a fair shot.  However, when she comes in contact with Jake Wrigley as his court appointed attorney, things get really interesting and she finds herself wanting her own piece of happiness.From the very beginning I was hooked.  Rachel Blaufeld has a way of corralling you and keeping you pinned up until the very end.  I am in awe of her ability to conjure up the most beautiful stories with amazing plots.  This novel left me happy, in angst, crying and then shouting hallelujah all at the same time!  When things get rocky, the story gets even better.  This is a must to add to your library!  Exquisitely satisfying, Rachel!Hero – Jake Wrigley 5 starsHeroine – Alyson Road 5 starsSteam Level: 5 starsPlot: 5 starsCliffhanger: No

Overall Rating:  4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆Stumbling across a new author is one of my favorite things and when the author writes paranormal romance it’s really exciting to explore that genre through a new perspective.  In The Breed: Casstiel's Vow, Alice K. Wayne skillfully ignites the reader's imagination with a new outlook on vampires and werewolves co-existing with humans without their knowledge.  Casstiel and Tessa find their connection amid kidnapping, a long existing war between hunters and the Breed and an uncertain future.  This is their journey to happiness and an everlasting bond.When Tessa's brother Quinn is kidnapped by a pack of werewolves, family life as she knows it changes and becomes a search and rescue existence.  Using her gift to read minds she finds the Breeds and her family is bought under the protection of Sebastian, a vampire that has opened his home as a sanctuary for families that are affected by the war.  Two years later Quinn is spotted and her parents load up and head to California.  While they are away another citing of Quinn happens in New York and Tessa and her friend Nora make the journey from Boston to meet with the Breed defense team searching for her brother. Nora is a complex scared werewolf with a feisty spirit battling the past.For the last 33 years Casstiel has been the leader of the defense team ran out of the New York City Embassy.  His team consists of Ghost, Sebastian had contacted him awhile back about Quinn's kidnapping.  Cass has been dreaming of his perfect mate.  When his dream becomes reality he will stop at nothing to secure their bond even if she is a human.  Tessa's gift always caused her to hideaway from people and entering the world of the Breeds she finally learns to accept and not hate it.The characters in this story are complex and comprehensive. The story is fast paced and well written.  I was completely engrossed throughout the entire story and highly recommend this for someone looking for a new twist on paranormal romance.  Talented, gripping, and completely entertaining this book will keep you involved in this adventure.  The steamy romance happening between our couple is smoldering and comes alive on the pages.  I was so excited about the ending of this book I had to purchase book two immediately to begin reading about Nora and Quinn's budding romance.  Highly recommend you add this book to your library.

Overall Rating:  4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆King Kong doesn't have anything on T.S. Joyce's Lowlander Silverback gorilla shifter romance! The author creates an angst filled relationship between the heroine and hero akin to Romeo and Juliet's tale of forbidden love.  Kong and Layla have been in love from a distance for over three years.  Yearning to connect but circumstances forbid it to occur.  Kong is royalty and his path and future is bound to his people's archaic practices.  Layla is treading in shark infested waters trying to stay afloat.  Her bills are piling up and as much as she works she is still being hounded by the bank for Mac's (her adoptive father of choice) home.  The home she grew up in and felt safe in.When Kong receives the call to return home to fulfill his duties, he is torn from his life and friends he has made in Saratoga.  Sacrificing his future with Layla is the only way he knows to keep her safe and alive.  Beaston and the Grayback Crew stand ready to help him stay and his life is forever changed.  Willa's jokes continue to get better and better and the other crew members bond strengthens to save one of their own, lessons are learned and the future is altered.Each book released by T.S. Joyce evokes certain emotions and takes me on a journey outside the chaotic daily grind.  Kong and Layla's story was beautiful and entertaining. Two lost souls needing each other to complete the other.  Don't take my word for it, buy this book and read it!

Overall Rating:  4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆The headlines read, Rock & Roll Princess and MC President ready to say their vows and live happily ever after!  Or will they?  In the third book of the Savage Angels MC series, author Kathleen Kelly reveals the long awaited wedding between two beautifully created characters she introduced in her first book in this series.  Intertwined within this book is also a reunion with multiple characters from previous books.  It is one big happy family…MC, Mafia, Rock & Roll Royalty and the townspeople of Tourmaline.  This is a feel good book, with hidden mysteries and drama!Kat and Dane are getting ready for the big I do day!  The church has been reserved and City Hall is being made ready for the reception. The cake is ordered, the dress has been procured and the tuxedos secured for the guys. Everything seems to be ready until an unexpected phone call, puts everyone in protection mode.  The past rears its ugly head and threatens to destroy everyone in its path.  Will the wedding of the century take place? Will Dane get his Kat?As Kat and Dane try to make it to the church on time, some of their friends find themselves inspired by the love bug!  Unlikely romances spring up all around Tourmaline and betrayed lovers reunite!  There is so much going on in this remarkable novel that all I can say is…you need to read this book, because there is no way a review can do it justice!  Ms. Kelly has out done herself with this latest release and I cannot wait to read her next installment in the life and love of her characters in this series!Hero: Dane Reynolds 4.5 starsHeroine: Kat Saunders 4.5 starsSteam: 4.5 starsPlot: 4.5 starsCliffhanger: No

Overall Rating: 4.25 Rockin’ ★★★★Life can be cruel at times.  You can do everything right, be a talented and beloved artist, but still end up on the short end of the stick, or sometimes on the abusive end of a fist.  In Misha Elliott's newest book, Saving Leah, she delves into the horrific world of domestic violence, while interlinking a love story so beautiful that it will leave you breathless.  The author creates characters that touch you as if he or she could be your best friend, someone that you know and love.  The design of the characters and the plot is elegantly crafted with agony as well as heartfelt hope.Leah Campbell is a prodigy on the violin.  Since she was a small child she captured her audiences and the hearts of everyone that heard her play.  After the death of her parents when she was still a young adolescence, her life became something she didn't recognize. A secret so dark and haunting plagued her into adulthood and her music was adversely affected.  Now she is trying to pick up the pieces, trying to move on with her life and heal the best way she can as a victim of violent abuse.  Not trusting anyone and becoming somewhat of a hermit, Leah is thrust together with a most unlikely companion.  A man who just might be able to push beyond all of her defenses and become a balm to Leah's shattered soul.Asher Sky is an entrepreneur of sorts.  Asher knows loss, devastating, heart wrenching loss.  But life must go on, so he molds himself and makes a decent living modeling.  However, he feels his life is missing something, someone.  When he meets a beautiful girl, Leah Campbell, in a tragic incident, things become clear to him.  He begins to yearn for something special, only his.  Asher knows that something is off with Leah, she is broken and he wants to help her mend.This is truly a beautiful yet a difficult story at times to read.  The fact that the author was able to probe into the cruel savagery of abuse while giving us an unforgettable story that fills hearts with such passion and grace is beyond astounding.  This is definitely a must read, but just make sure you have plenty of Kleenexes available!  Fearlessly executed, Misha!

Overall Rating:  4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆Sometimes you need to stop and smell the roses. I heard this quote so many times growing up and as I read this novel, I realized how long it's been since I actually took that advice. During my literary voyage reading the fabulously written novel Hollywood Dirt by Alessandra Torre, I did just that! Hollywood charm meets Southern grit and that combination had me in stitches at times, while I thoroughly enjoyed the plot as it unfolded. This is Carson and Summer's happily ever after and their journey to discover their true inner selves.  It is something you do not want to miss!Carson is Hollywood's golden boy. The perfect actor, perfect husband, perfect male specimen until he returns home one evening early to catch his wife with another man! His world is rocked and shifts to an ugly fight over property and his newest venture a movie he is producing and starring in.  Summer is southern to the core. She grew up in the little town of Quincy, where Sunday church attendance is required and everyone knows everyone else's business. Her southern drawl is as feisty as her temper and manners of course are mandatory!  When the two collide, sparks ignite and a love/hate relationship blossoms. But being a gentle bred lady, Summer reigns in her temper and tries to maintain an aloof persona towards the handsome entitled actor.I must say Ms. Torres has written a magnificent book from start to finish. The elements that she inserts remind me of growing up in the south and I can relate so well to the characters. The interaction between the main characters keeps you involved and the secondary are perfectly woven to fit flawlessly into the story. Bennington was the scout looking for places to film and when he meets Summer a true friendship begins. She helps him gain access to the families that he is looking to use their properties as location spots and in return he helps fund her way to get out of Quincy. The rooster is one of my favorite things in the story, loved Cocky and all he brought to the read. Such a welcome addition to my library and I cannot stress enough how you need to buy this book!

Overall Rating:  4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆Call it kismet, love or lust at first sight but that is exactly what happens in Shades, the Outlaw series book 3.  Author Nicole James sets this exceptional MC Romance in Birmingham, Sweet Home Alabama and seamlessly integrates characters from her previous books into this series.  The development of the new storyline and the continuation of previous ones is a work of pure genius. As you read this novel you will feel as though you are submerged into the life of the Evil Dead MC. Skylar and Shades story of young love lost and then found again is beautifully written, with unforeseen twist and turns that leaves the reader wanting more.Like is not easy as a prospect to the Evil Dead MC, but is what Shades has always wanted!  That is until he met Skylar.  He knew that he should keep her at arm’s length, but something about her will not let him. When he is given an ultimatum, Skylar or the club, he was not prepared for her to just disappear.  After ten years of emptiness seeing her again, just reinforces the fact that she is his and his alone!  Is it possible for them to turn time back, and reclaim what was lost? There are forces that are still working against them being together again and it will take everything he has to keep her where she belongs, at his side.Seeing Shades again was the last thing that Skylar wanted, but there he was.  Standing in front of her was Shades wearing his VP patch showing her that he had gone on with his dreams when she disappeared.  Time changes a lot of things but not the connection she had always felt with him.  He broke her heart and now wants to be let back into her life.  There are forces coming after her that can destroy not only her, but also Shades and his club.  Can she take a chance?  Read this MC Romance and find out what happens with Skylar and Shades.  You will not be disappointed that you added this novel to your library, I know that I wasn’t!

Overall Rating:  4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆In Wolf, book four of the Outlaw series by author extraordinaire Nicole James we met a beastly dominate bad boy biker that dominates a girly tomboy in a battle for control, and the winner takes all! Ms. James characters are bigger than life but at the same time filled with human emotions. This story covers a lot of territory, not only emotionally but also geographically, ranging from the west coast to the badlands of North Dakota.  The story that unfolds on the pages of this book is one of love, passion, denial and hope.  Crystal and Wolf’s story is not an easy one, but in the end it is one of forgiveness with a future for our two star crossed lovers.He is a player and a lover of women and a bad boy that loves playing the field without comment! That is the way Wolf swings until he met Crystal six years before.  Now after all this time he either has to man up or let her go but the letting go is not something he thinks he can do.  When Crystal leaves without saying goodbye, Wolf realizes that maybe he should have done things differently.Crystal can no longer be his go to girl.  She needs Wolf to either comment or leave her alone so that she can move on.  When things come to a head, she realizes he will never claim her as his own and so she makes plans and leaves to start a new life.  Leaving behind Wolf, the club and all of her friends is hard, but the secrets she carries with her are harder to deal with.  No one but Wolf has ever held her heart and life looks bleak without him.  He has shattered her soul and crushed her heart only time will tell if she can start over without him.A hidden force stretches its evil tentacles to disrupt and destroy not only the Evil Dead MC but also those that they love. It is not a respecter of innocent bystanders, and retribution is its only focus.  If you enjoy a good MC romance then this is the book and series for you.  I cannot wait for the next release in this series.

Overall Rating: 5 Rockin’ ★★★★★As I read this book, one thing really stood out and that was the story itself. Mayra Statham has produced a memorable love story in her latest release, Davenport Harbor.  I loved the way it started and also the technique she used to build the complex relationship between Anne and John. Switching back and forth between their POV was a fantastic way to let the reader inside the thought processes and feelings of each character. The interaction between the two main characters is perfect and it explains so many things that happen to them in this book as they move toward their HEA!John is the ultimate alpha male that knows how to control his environment and those around him. He grows as the story progresses into more, as he becomes a loving, caring friend and lover! The past haunts him and he is trapped inside his memories of another time!  When he intervenes and rescues a stranded motorist, little does he know that it is his new beginning? A woman also haunted by her past and an innocent child drive away his nightmares and bring light to his life.Her dreams were filled with happily ever after, not running from a horrific beast that threatened to destroy her if he found her.  Anne had managed to escape from her abusive boyfriend and stay hidden, until he found her again.  When her car broke down on the side of the road, things looked desolate!  Then a beautiful man stopped and would not take no for an answer when she refused his help.  He may seem like an unlikely knight in shining armor, but maybe he was just what she needed.Two scared souls that need each other to find healing meet and begin their journey together. As in anything worth having it is not an easy path that they take together.  Obstacles will be thrown at them and not just from others, but also from each other.  Will Anne and John find their way?  Read this beautifully written story and find out!

Overall Rating: 4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆What do you get when you put three sexy cowboys with one insatiable sheriff's deputy cowgirl?  That would be Jodi Linton's newest victory, Pretty Lawless, A Deputy Laney Briggs Novel.  Once again, I would like to applaud this author with her quirky southern charm and humor, laced with erotic sexiness.  The characters are so deliciously written that the reader can easily be part of the story while holding on to every word until the very end.Deputy Laney Briggs is at it again.  She's driven in her need to find the truth and will do whatever it takes, literally, to find out the facts.  Even if it means she has to undermine her favorite sexy Texas Ranger, Gunner Wilson.  Although, her heart belongs to Gunner, she enlists the help of the flirtatious hottie, Marshal Colt Larsen who stokes her fire in more than one way.  Although, finally getting what she wants with Gunner opening up, they are all thrown into a whirlwind of craziness that will leave you begging for more.Picking up from the last novel, Deputy Briggs is hot on the trail of finding out why her delectably seductive dear old friend Luke Wagner was arrested by her sexy Texas Ranger. There are so many twists and turns throughout this final novel that you will be completely entranced, while delightfully amused by the created characters.  Jodi Linton has a way with words that never ceases to amaze me.  The way the story ends showered me with bliss, even though I was extremely saddened that the story was over.  You make me happier than a two peckered dog, Jodi!Hero -  4.5 starsHeroine -  4.5 starsSteam Level: 4.5 starsPlot: 4.5 starsCliffhanger: No

Overall Rating:  4.5 Rockin’ '''''Violence breeds violence, as does self-destruction and not dealing with it leads to obliteration.  WOW…what an emotional roller coaster ride in this surprisingly intense second novel in the Deadly Sins Series by author Jennifer Miller.  In Fighting Wrath, Ms. Miller addresses widespread social issues wrapped up in an MMA package. In Tyson and Sydney’s story we explore two broken souls searching for acceptance, reclamation and peace from their abusive past.Tyson has always been the protector, the surrogate father, provider and sometimes just twin brother!  His life has not been easy, but he has made it.  He uses fighting to release the rage that lives just below the surface.  Those that care about him and are trying to help him, have no idea what he is really going through.  No one does, until he stares into a pair of big blue eyes and a connection is formed.  Sydney pulls him and at the same time gives him something he has never had.He is unlike any one I have ever known!  From the moment I saw him, my world shifted. Secrets and distance from others are how Sydney has survived.  Ensuring that those she cares about are taken care of is all that matters and she is willing to sacrifice to make that happen. Does she dare open up and share herself with Tyson?  Will he be willing to accept those sacrifices and see the woman underneath?The settings range from an MMA training facility to a book store and a risqué strip club! Each character created by this talented author enhances the storyline but also delves deeply into the essence of needed reforms and protections in our society.  Characters introduced in the first book in this series flow through and interact within this next installment in the series.  This is a must read that you will not want to miss!

Overall Rating: 5 Rockin’ '''''Jordan Marie has done it again! Claiming Crusher is a phenomenal five star read! The buildup is steady and the ending will blow your socks off.  Sit back with a nice glass of wine, box of tissues and enter the world of the Savage Brothers MC.  There are multiple storylines running parallel throughout and the growth of each character attests to the brilliance of this author. In Loving Nicole we were left hanging, full of questions about Dani and Crusher’s relationship.  Many disliked Nicole’s haughty best friend, especially after the shooting incident. Her character was portrayed as a party girl, stripper looking for her next fix, but as we read we learn that there is so much more to this intricately complex character.  Her background was a mystery, and little did we know of the absolute horror that the young Melinda suffered at the hands of her abusive husband.  Questions are answered about why she is running, who she is, and what she wantsaa from her new life.  Attraction and desire between the hero and heroine and their battle between good and evil dominants this book. You will not want to miss the happily ever after ending, Crusher and Dani are given.Crusher is the VP of the Savage Brothers MC, and a playboy. He carries a burden from his younger years of a love tragically lost.  When he first meets the red lipped, feisty beauty, he is drawn to her lost soul.  Time and time again, he tries to break through the barriers she has erected, only to be turned away.  He hurts deeply for her and loves even deeper.  You will laugh, cry and hurt alongside him as he forges the impossible by claiming a woman that has no desire to ever be claimed again.Melinda aka Dani aka Hellcat is a strong courageous woman that fought for freedom from the dark oppression and gloom of a marriage arranged by her father to a monster named Michael.  In the previous books, I had strong feelings of dislike towards Dani because of the drama her actions caused to unfold between Dragon and Nicole.  You will not feel this way any longer. Jordan Marie humanizes Dani to a point you literally will feel like you are crawling inside the character’s mind and soul.This book delves into domestic violence at an extreme level.  The horrific punishments dealt out by Michael and his henchman Donald, are graphic and yet the story being told about Dani would be incomplete without them.  The ending is comical, therapeutic and gory all at the same time.  I look forward to the next book in this series.  Each one continues to shine a light on the club, but also on the women that are opening up the readers understanding and perception of the Savage Brothers MC.

Overall Rating:  4 Rockin’ ★★★★They grew up together and have always been friends.  In Laid Out, Worth the Fight series this friendship grows and evolves into something entirely different than either expected.  Author Sidney Halston once again delivers an incredible, heart stopping read for her fan’s enjoyment!  The book is set in Tarpon Springs, Florida and centers on a group of MMA fighters, the gym they train at, and their friends and family. Ms. Halston’s characters in this novel could be your next door neighbors or friends you get together with and go out for dinner and drinks.  This novel is filled with realistic characters and situations that are easily related to while still totally involving the reader in an action pack story.Our hero, Cain Sorensen has loved Violet Channing as long as he has known her.  He gave her, her first kiss and then gave her up because his best friend loved her too.  Struggling for years watching them together almost destroyed him.  When his friend was killed in an ambush, Cain’s guilt once again kept him away from Violet.  Is there a way for them to be together?  Will Violet ever feel the same way about him that he feels about her?  Take the time to enjoy this emotional story about love and friendship!Hero: Cain Sorensen 4 starsHeroine: Violet Channing 4 starsSteam: 4 starsPlot: 4 starsCliffhanger: No

Overall Rating:  4.25 Rockin’ ★★★★Once again Lynn Raye Harris hits the target dead center with her latest book Hot & Bothered.  This is number eight in her HOT series and is filled with military ops, suspense, passion, denial and eventually a happily ever after for her main characters.  You will not want to miss, Emily and Ryan’s story of redemption and love found!Mistakes made as a broken young woman lead her to bin Yusuf, the man she thought was her Prince Charming, but ended up being the devil in disguise.  Branded as a threat to her country, Emily Royal bin Yusuf realizes she will never have a normal life.  The only way she can redeem herself is to find a way to prove that she is not a terrorist and is a loyal US citizen.  So when she is approached with a deal from a Black Operative that will wipe her past clean, Emily doesn’t hesitate, she accepts.Flash has been there for Emily since his team rescued her from a militant group and returned her to the US. He has told himself that she is untouchable and there can never be any relationship between them, only friendship.  When Emily disappears without a word, he is devastated and cannot believe that she would return to the area where she was rescued from! Return to help bring down another terrorist cell!  Ryan will do whatever he has to do to find her and keep her safe, even if she doesn’t want him too!Hero: Ryan ‘Flash’ Gordon 4.25 starsHeroine: Emily Royal bin Yusuf 4.25 starsSteam: 4.25 starsPlot: 4.25 starsCliffhanger: No

Overall Rating:  4.25 Rockin’ ★★★★Do you believe that it is possible for a monster to have a heart, that it can feel, love and be loved?  Is it possible to find redemption and forgiveness through the love and belief of another person?  Or will the darkness that threatens to consume everything inside the monster kill the only good thing it has ever had? In this original novel, Strong Enough by the talented author M. Leighton, we are faced with this dilemma. It a story filled with conundrums and angst. The characters find themselves in a quandary as they work to find a resolution and a future together.His life had been twisted by a psychotic, abusive father.  A father that killed his oldest son as his wife and younger child watched him carry out his horrific deed. Has his horrendous past turned Jasper King into the one thing he never wanted to be, a monster like his father? He has been able to control all aspects of his life. Control has allowed him to carry out his missions, complete the jobs he was assigned without feeling anything.  That was until a beautiful woman with hair like fire and a spirit that burned into his soulless heart, looked into his eyes. Muse affects him like no one ever has; will she be his redemption or his downfall?Raised by a military father that protected while loving, Muse Harper knows about control, heartache.  When her father fails to make their assigned call in, Muse hires a bounty hunter to help her locate him.  But the man that walks into her place of business is not what she was expecting.  He is beyond beautiful, all male dominance and the electrical attraction flows between them.  Can she trust this man to help her find her father?  It is not hard to see that Jasper King has many secrets and if she is not careful she may not just lose her heart, it may be permanently damaged.  There’s an old saying, nothing ventured…nothing gained, so maybe trust will earn a future if they are both strong enough!Hero: Jasper King 4.25 starsHeroine: Muse Harper starsSteam: 4.25 starsPlot: 4.25 starsCliffhanger: No

Overall Rating: 4.5  Rockin’ ★★★★☆In Be Here Now, we find ourselves once again in the small community of Cedar Creek visiting with characters introduced in the first book in this series. Rocky Mountain high meets Rock Star is the story told in Julia Goda’s second book in her Cedar Creek series.  Ms. Goda shares the story of one, very special woman and the man that let her almost get away! This is Loreley and Jason’s story about their lost love and how they are able to find it again, with a few twist and unexpected turns along the way.Loreley Cooper has loved only one man in her life, Jason Sanders.  When he destroyed her world with a few words, she leaves him and returns home.  Life for Loreley continues, but true love never dies.  It is just buried waiting to be uncovered.  So when Jason Sanders walks back in her life demanding that she talk with him, can she take a chance?  Is it possible to let the past go and find peace in forgiveness?She is the one woman that he can never forget. No other could ever take her place in his heart or life.  After six years and hitting an all-time low, Jason knows it is time to face the woman he loves and claim her once again. He has questions for Loreley! Like, why did she leave him without saying goodbye?  Why didn’t she answer his calls, text?  Is it too late for them?  Jason is determined to win her back and will not take no for an answer.Secrets have a way of destroying those that keep them!  Has Loreley’s secrets destroyed her chance of happiness with Jason?  Read this amazing love story to uncover all of the secrets that Jason and Loreley kept from one another.Hero: Jason Sanders 4.5 starsHeroine: Loreley Cooper 4.5 starsSteam: 4.5 starsPlot: 4.5 starsCliffhanger: No

Overall Rating: 4.5  Rockin’ ★★★★☆Bethany Bazile's book, Fight For Me is a masterful piece of fiction that delves into the domain of the UFC. It also includes a tumultuous love story that will rock your world from beginning to end.  Bethany is a brilliant writer that definitely ranks among the greats and it shows in her latest book.  Laughter, love, passion and belonging are intertwined throughout this story, taking you on an unforgettable journey.Ryder Hayes is a UFC fighter.  His past family experiences has made him hard, and has driven him to become a champion in the cage.  Although when push comes to shove...his weakness is his family and always will be.  Related by marriage, Ryder has always had a thing for Alexis his stepsister.  When she attempts to take her own life, Ryder knows he needs to step forward and help her. He realizes he wants to fight for her and that he would always need to protect her.Alexis Cole has lost so much.  First her dad died, and then her brother.  It was just too much for her to handle.  So one emotion filled night she decides she wants to die and attempts to take her own life.  However, when she is saved, it makes her realized that life goes on and she must too.  With the help of her family, and her undeniable desire for Ryder Hayes, Alexis takes one step forward at a time.  Will she be able to move on and let herself and Ryder give into their desire for each other?I was enthralled by this beautiful story from the first page.  Each revelation tugged at my heart as well as filled me with a desire to learn more about the characters.  I am thoroughly awestruck by this author and the way her exquisite words are fromed on paper to create a picture of love, passion and family.  I look forward to reading the next installment from Bethany Bazile.Hero -  4.5 starsHeroine -  4.5 starsSteam Level: 4.5 starsPlot: 4.5 starsCliffhanger: No

Overall Rating: 4.5 Rockin’ ★★★★☆Freedom is not always what you dream it will be!  In S. M. Donaldson’s next book in her series, Marco’s MMA Boys, she unveils Huck and Chelsea’s story. Holding Huck’s Heart is moving and at times heartbreaking as we delve into the lives of not only MMA fighters but also those individuals that belong to the men in this tough sport. This author is not afraid to expose taboo subjects and the way they are often looked at through our society’s eyes, off-limits and distasteful. Strippers that work to pay the bills, people with different sexual orientation and abusive relationships are just a few of the areas that are explored in this insightful novel. Ms. Donaldson holds true to her HEA ending while opening up the endless possibilities of life.She was his tutor in high school and he fell for her hard, but she left and didn’t look back!  But she has returned to help dad take care of her mom.  Why is she working at that strip joint?  Huck feels betrayed, yet at the same time he still feels something for her.  So many things are happening all at once!  Secrets are being uncovered that may tear his world a part or maybe make it stronger.  Can he take a chance?Her lover/boss had made promises, promises that he had not kept.  When Chelsea's family needs her to return home and help take care of her sick mother, it’s a no brainer.  She packs up and says good bye but will her past let her leave it behind.  When she runs into Huck at the hospital where she is working, all the old feelings are still there for him.  Is there a chance for them to have a future?  Life has never been easy, so when the past comes back and demands she let it back in, what is she to do?Something sinister is lurking, waiting to pounce!  Will they survive it?Hero: Huckleberry ‘Huck’ Webb 4.5 starsHeroine: Chelsea Harmon 4.5 starsSteam: 4.5 starsPlot: 4.5 starsCliffhanger: No

Overall Rating:  4.25 Rockin’ ★★★★What happens when the President of the largest MC in the country comes up against one of the most powerful crime families in the country? Read Kathleen Kelly’s second book in the Savage Angels MC and find out! This is the unlikely love story of Emily Reynolds and Salvatore Agostino and not one you will want to miss!Salvatore Agostino is Captain for the Abruzzi crime family and he has never been accused of being a nice man. His rise was fast and resented by some of the older members.  Sal had fought his way to the top and even though he was considered young for his position, he was loyal to his family.  So when he was told to do something by the head of the family, he did not hesitate. On the way to take care of business, he rescues an innocent young woman, not once but twice.  This woman touches Sal’s heart in a way that no one ever has before.  She needs a keeper, someone to protect her.  He maybe a member of a crime family, but he does not harm women!Emily has lived her entire life in an abusive home where her father abused and beat her mother.  Her only protection had been her brother Dane and when their father kicked him out she was left alone. Now years later, Emily decides it is time to find Dane and let him know how she feels.  Taking off from the hospital, where she had nursed their father until the end, she doesn’t think about what she is doing.  On the way she is accosted at a rest room and is rescued by another man.  Then she runs off the road and hits a tree!  Once again the same man that saved her saves her again. Is this a coincidence? The feelings that her rescuer evokes are like none she has ever experienced before.When Emily and Sal find out more about each other, is there a chance for them?  Will their backgrounds destroy them or will they come out on the other side together?  Kathleen Kelly has done it again with this intricately woven tale of love going against all odds and winning!Hero: Salvatore Agostino 4.25 starsHeroine: Emily Reynolds 4.25 starsSteam: 4.25 starsPlot: 4.25 starsCliffhanger: No

Overall Rating: 4 Rockin’ ★★★★Are you ready to take a trip into the forests of Montana, where a man or a bear can remain hidden?  That is where the talented paranormal author, Kim Fox takes us in her Smokejumpers Werebear book #5.  The crew’s gentle giant, Keene bonds with Chloe Sparks, a nosy reporter, searching for shifters to calm an aching vendetta that has her yearning for the ultimate outing of their kind.  Their tale has laughter, moments of heart spiking adrenaline, and truth being found in the most unlikely places.Keene's a polar bear shifter and member of the Hudson Crew.  He's loyal to his brothers but when Chloe begins questioning him about shifters, he just can't tell her no.  She's his mate! So, he gives her enough information to keep her interested hoping she will get to know him and accept his claim.  Chloe has been searching for answers since she was twelve.  She wants everyone to know about the shifters only she wasn't planning on meeting Keene and liking the big guy.Without giving away the ending, there is a cliffhanger with a Segway into the next couple's story.  The entire crew is left hanging and we won't know what is happening until we get the next book.***Received an ARC of this book from the Author in exchange for an honest review***

Overall Rating: 3.5 Rockin’ ★★★☆In spin-off Bearly Breathing by Kim Fox, we are introduced to three werebears finding their mates and their journey to a happily ever after.  In this comedic bear shifter story there are remnants of the Three Stooges only in lieu of Larry, Curly and Mo this trio is made up of Connor, Edwin, and Sidney!  These characters will have you in stitches.  Our heroines, Rebecca, Angie and Grace are from the big city and are not accustom to the rough outdoors, but when Rebecca wins a weekend trip to kayak on the Saco River in New Hampshire she rounds her besties up and heads out for the adventure of their lives!While kayaking a flash flood occurs and each couple is split up by Mother Nature's wrath.  We are then given a snippet of couple’s night spent outdoors in the wilderness.  If you can imagine Kim Kardashian and Paul Bunyan stranded in the woods without supplies...then you will begin to understand the hilarious events that take place in this backwoods tale.***Received an ARC of this book from the Author in exchange for an honest review***

I was able to install it perfectly on the very first try, no air bubbles. I highly recommend this protect, do not even hesitate to buy this, it's well worth it and you will not be disappointed.Sample product for review courtesy of Lightning Knight

These brushes are soft and good quality for the price of $30. I used them today to do my makeup and all I have to say is I'm sold. The brushes hold product well and get the job done.The Carrying Case with zipper is nice, keeps all my brushes and fits in my purse.I love everything about this set and recommend it to anyone who wants adorable Makeup Brushes Set!I received a sample of this product in exchange for a honest and unbiased review. All opinions are based upon my own experiences with the product.

this is am engaging true story. The story of  Micki and her husband Butch along with their family is told in stages beginning when one of the children's lives is in jeopardy. Nothing is scarier than losing a child, nor heart wrenching. The author tells this story with an honesty and a beautiful story that is hard to put down and impossible to forget after the last page is turned.

this book takes a look into the lives of three friends and tells their story and what is what like growing up in a different era. It is a tale of life and love and the author has brought out what it was like to live in the fifties and sixties when I think people were more innocent, but like any other era able to find trouble. It is a tale of friendship, hardship and what true friends mean to each other. The story was well written and I think readers will enjoy this bittersweet reminiscence.

The story is a retelling of A Christmas Carol by Charles Dickens, If you don't know the story that has been passed down through the ages, it is one not to be missed as Ebeneezer Scrooge learns about life and how his miserly ways are going to haunt him in this life and the next. He is going to find out though in a night filled with spirits, visions and a hard lesson learned. this book is also in Italian as well as English and has some beautiful illustrations to keep the readers eye as fascinated as their minds.

I really enjoyed this book that is the second in an interesting. If you read book one, you will know some of the characters and be delighted by a few new faces as well. In this book, Shawna Lee takes center stage and readers are going to find a lot of secrets about her and her past as the story line twists, turns and then comes full circle. The author does an amazing job of writing and although I am not much of a romance reader this story has so much more to it that many readers will enjoy the story of love, life and how the past seems to always hit us when we least expect it.

Cute books with wonderful rhymes and a great lesson about how you can find help in the most unexpected places. Beautiful illustrations add so much charm to this already fantastic books that little ones will love and parents and grandparents will want to add to the must read library.

Billy is a typical kid, maybe a little smarter than some, but just a kid. When he sees a man in his backyard, he tells his dad, but by then the man is gone. Of course, he's not gone  for  good and when he returns it is to kidnap the boy he wants for a son. Ths novel is about child abduction and how it affects the family and it is also a story of trying to survive when you are faced with your worst nightmare. I found the book to be more of a look at what the side effects can be and how families deal with the terrible situation, but it also had soe suspense and horror as readers are carried along on Billy's nightmare.

It's the holiday season and this amazing book is a great one to share with children and grandchildren. Author Midge Newth has once again created a beautiful book that not only shares great recipes, but also shares the true meaning of Christmas. The author must have a large. loving heart to create such warmth in her books. Grabbing a Midge Newth book is grabbing a treasure for families and stories that must be shared. Thank goodness for the authors' characters Charlie and Nana and the fun they share with readers.

This is such a great series, and will appeal to a lot of readers. The author has taken the story of soul collection to a new level by giving readers the character of Jack. He is a bit of a bumbler at this new job he was given and that is highly understandable if you think about it. I love the story line and I have thoroughly enjoyed Paul B. Kohler's writing and innovation in this incredible series. Book 5 gives readers a hard look at life and death and is emotionally touching with th collection that has to be made this time.

This is the second deathly musings collection I have had the pleasure to read. Once again the well written short stories take the readers into a dark and sometimes erotic place through the numerous stories in this collection. A lot of twists and turns throughout the stories make this a collection the faint of heart should read with the light on. If you are a fan of short stories and well told tales, this is one to grab.

Very informative book that not only includes mouth watering recipes with easy to follow instructions, but the nutritional information to help you decide which ones you want to try.I love that all can be made in a slow cooker. I would have liked more information on why these are anti inflammatory foods, but the recipes themselves make this a great book to have handy in your kitchen, especially with the colder days of winter coming our way.

Interesting read with a lot of characters including Lydia Strong, who along with her husband Jeffrey Mark are investigating the disappearance of a young girl, who was Lydia's friend. The author gave the story a lot of twists and turns, especially at the end. I wish she would have said more about Lydia's past because hints came up here and there, but I never did quite find the story that seemed to have a lot to do with the person Lydia has become. all in all though this is an intense novel that will keep readers hanging on for a wild ride.

I loved the location, the characters and the story line. J. P. Beaumont is a retired policeman and detective.He is going to recall all he knows when several deaths happen while he is on a supposed 'pleasure' cruise. I found the story fun to read and the author a writer who know how to tell stories a reader can sit back and enjoy. Murder, mystery and a cruise to remember.

Informative read with a lot of common sense ideas, one I really like and know works is the keeping of  of food diary. The author includes a lot of helpful hints in the book along with the good eating combined with exercise, even a good dose of yoga, which is something all can try. Also included is a explanation of the types of foods, good and bad, that all will find helpful when you are trying to either lose a few pounds or to change a lifestyle. This is a good book to keep around to help us out.

For me the really interesting part of the story is the  location. I live in Montana myself and use the scenery in a lot of my own books, in fact that's why I bought this one. The author did a good job bringing the feel and the problems of small town life and its' unique problems into this novel.Jules is the sheriff in the small town of Blue Deer, MT ( you have to read the book to find the secret behind the name.) In this novel, Jules is up to his eyeballs in murders and finding the killer or killers takes readers into the idiosyncrasies of the people who inhabit the town. The novel was mysterious, suspenseful and touched with humor.

I usually worry when I pick up a book with all five star reviews, wondering if it will live up to the acclaim. This story did. It is a well written touching story about Martha, a woman suffering with Alzheimers. It is also a story of family,and told through reminiscences of family members as things that happen i the present trigger memories of the past. All families have good times and bad times and this story shares them all with love, tenderness and the  spirituality of hope and dreams. I usually like to read suspense thrillers and this beautiful story, although a different genre, is a must have touching story. Well done!

Glenn Trust is an amazing author and if you haven't read the other books in this series, just let me say you are going to love Alice. Glenn Trust knows how to combine, thrills, suspense and a bit of love in a way that makes this novel a must have page turner, The more novels I read by this author the more I want to read. Grabbing a Glenn Trust novel for an avid reader is like a piece of candy to a sugar addict. Satisfying and good!

Welcome to Hangtown, an old west town with all you would expect in a time of gold fever. Tom has met  Lacey and the fever he gets has nothing to do with gold, it is love sickness that has stricken Tom. As the author tells the tale, of course, there is so much more. John Rose Putnam never disappoints with his telling of old west tales, add in a romantic touch and you have a tale you won't be able to put down and a story that will take ou back in time. Great job!

I really enjoyed these interesting short stories that covered a variety of topics. The author has a great writing style and a way to keep the readers turning  page after page as each short story unfolds. I really enjoyed the ones that involved time and recommend them to readers who like a good story with that added twist that makes the tale worth while.

Great read, V.I. Warshawski is a woman I'd like on my side. A bit of a bull headed trouble maker who gets the job done. I loved that the  author took the private investigator into the world of corrupt medicine in this suspense filled read, V.I. is looking out for her friends when a sixteen year old pregnant friend dies while giving birth, also losing the baby. The author has a great writing style that is believable in its' every day language and situations. I am definitely looking forward to reading more novels by Sara Paretsky.

Great series, especially for young adults who love fantasy. Meet Ezemelda, The Genie and Countess Sybil Van Dyk who shows up to ask Ezemelda and The Genie to remove a curse that was placed  on her by The dark Lord, this is where the amazing adventure begins.Readers should pick up all the books in this special collection!

Readers are in for a treat as they follow  fifteen year old Liberty as she tries to deal with  an uncertain future following a devastating past for not only her, but the whole world. The author has an amazing ability to write a compelling story in a small package. Great job in an intriguing, yet short novel.

Oh, the memories this  special book bring to ind! The author has yet again captured family and togetherness in a special combination. This series is a special and well done collection to share with those you love. Not to mention the special recipes written with not only love but more importantly, directions! A great idea and a heartwarming addition to collection!

This is a well written novel that takes an introspective look into not only the characters, but into the interesting and compelling subject of life after life. The author has an interesting writing style that will have readers paying careful attention and hungrily devouring the pages of this novel. What a great way to get lost in the chapters as you fall into the story.

If you haven't read any of the books in this amazing series you are missing out not only on a great theme, but a well told story. Imagine if you will having the job as a soul collector, the author has done this and a whole lot more in this intriguing series. I hope readers will grab all the books and then loose themselves ib the series that is so well written and compelling, I hope the author keeps it going for a long time. The series would make  an amazing conversion to a television series as readers follow along with the unusual and supernatural collections made.I love the humor added as Jack learns the trade and as author Paul B. Kohler takes readers on an unusual and amazing thrill ride.

Great story taking readers into the darkness of the  occult with a twisted tale readers will not only find fascinating, make will have them unable to get this well written story off their minds. Darla Hogan is one of the best short story writers I have read. If this is a precursor to a new collection, you will find me at the front of the line waiting for my copy.

What a great idea! I love a journal, but Shalu Sharma has created much more than that. As you read the questions and try to come up with answers you will find yourself looking deep into yourself and examining avenues you may have never thought of before. This book would make a great  gift and then later when the receiver has finished answering all the questions, both fun and thought provoking, this journal will make a wonderful keepsake. How fun will it be to go back years from now and see how different your answers have become or in some cases stayed steadfastly the same. Amazing what to keep track of life, love and laughter.

Interesting read that tells the story of Alexie Georg and includes a lot of strange happenings. I loved the musical connection and the obsession with the white sea whales. The author was able to tell a story of intrigue and also one that looks inside of a person's life and choices. I love the connections that run throughout and keep the reader fascinated as they follow along on a different adventure. Well done.

as the world goes into turmoil, Lars Lindgren goes off the grid and becomes a survivalist. When he finds Eileen Branson, not to far from his hiding place, he at first is worried about who she is and what she might want, but then she is invited to stay at his place and their relationship blossoms as they learn about survival. It is not an apocalypse, but it is close and readers will find this book an interesting look at what might just happen in our own near future, What if the power was gone?  how would you survive and who would you want to survive with you? The author does a great job answering these questions and taking a look at what may just be an inevitable future.

Jack Duffy is back and learning more about his new job, a job which both fascinates and scares me. The author has done a great job with this story. If you haven't read the other books in the series you can read this one as a stand alone, I however suggest you grab all the books and then leave yourself some time to savor the unique, well written series. Paul B. Kohler never disappoints as he gives readers a well told story that will make you think and one that will remain with you long after the book is closed. I loved the storyline and where the author takes readers as we follow along!

The author introduces readers to Jack, a very interesting person who gas a unique job. In fact he just received it and is learning the ropes so to speak.As the reader follows Jack the incredible story unfolds and readers will find it is unlike any they have previously read. The author does an amazing job with this beautiful story that is going to have readers thinking about it long after they close the last page. I found this book extraordinary in the telling and the thought behind the story. Great job from an amazing author. Grab this one!

I love a Robert Thornhill book and this is a great one to grab, murder, mystery and a lot of conspiracy combine in an excellent story. Old friends are back if you have read other novels, if you haven't they are amazing, but this is also a stand alone book. Jack Carson has a lead on a conspiracy he can't wait to report on, but unfortunately his source dies in what is not an accident. That's where the investigative group Walt Williams investigators come in. Run by Walt and his brother in law Kevin McBride, the investigation company is one you want on your side. This is where the adventure and conspiracy begin and readers are definitely going to love the twists, turns and thrills!

This was an interesting short read. The author does a great job bringing the characters of Victoria Noakes and Robert Jones to life. Readers are in for a laugh or two and a couple of surprises in this inside look at two people rekindling an old flame. The author knows how to keep readers' attentions and make us all take a look at life and love.

I can't tell you how interesting this book is. If you are honest with yourself and answer the questions enclosed in the book, you will not only find some amazing things about yourself, but also find a way to fix the areas you may be lacking in. Shalu Sharma has thought of everything with  her questions. They are an in depth look at one's self. I agree with the author that keeping a journal is important and she has made the task an easy one with this carefully laid out journal. That part of the job is done for readers and it is a fun and introspective journey to answer the questions. The author has thought of everything and readers are going to love the challenge of coming up with the answers and take an honest look into their own lives.

I loved this book, I have to admit I am a music junky, but anyone will enjoy this great read. The author takes you behind the scenes in an awesome look behind the music. A lot of the trivia facts were knew to me and the author did a wonderful job blending the facts into a story like tale. I was taken back in time with each song and felt myself singing the lyrics in my head as I read the background of the songs. Thanks to the author who uplifted my day with the memories I will always cherish of the songs from the 70's and 80's.

If you haven't read book 1, this book can be read without it, but I highly recommend grabbing all the books in this mystery suspense series. Martina and Gloria have been through a lot in a short time, but just when they think they can escape to Las Vegas and leave their past behind, it catches up. Follow along as two friends in 1955 find murder, mayhem, love and laughs as they seem to always find themselves in the wrong place at the wrong time.  J.R. Wright gives his female characters just the right amount of grit and beauty and readers are in for a thrill ride.

Reminiscent of Lord of the Rings the author takes readers to a world of magic, gnomes, halflings, orcs and other creatures and of course Glolindir, the hero of the story. I enjoyed the book and feel it would be great for young adults and adults to grab and follow an amazing journey. Thanks to the author for carrying readers into a different world of magic, mystery and mayhem.

Because I write fiction books in this genre, I was excited to read this book and see how close to the truth my books are. I wasn't disappointed. The author takes you to the other side with a beautiful testament to what is waiting for us after we leave this life. The story was well written and fast paced. I am definitely going to be looking at a few of this author's other books, great job!

Great book, when readers meet Sophia, a widow, trying to raise three kids, they are going to love the woman and the fortitude she has. When readers follow the family to Grayson's ridge they are going to find themselves with fingers crossed for Sophia as she finds mystery, suspense and more than a few secrets in the home she is renting from Sydney whose late relatives, the Broderick's, have a lot of skeleton's in their closets. The author did a great job in a book that is not only a compelling read, but one avid readers are going to love because it is reader friendly and has a wonderful way of making us turn page after page in delight. I loved the twists and turns as the mystery unfolds. Great job!

Interesting read that is hard to put down. Readers are going to love Thomas King, a special man, with a few problems. Tom takes care of a forest in New Jersey. He loves the land a lot more than he loves most of the people in the area. Although he has good reason for this and not just because they make fun of him because of his learning disability. Tom is not an idiot, in fact more like just the opposite and readers are in for a story filled with more than just mystery, although that is certainly included. The author does an amazing job with character development along with a compelling story of love and loss, not only of persons but of the land which is Thomas King's true love. I recommend this book to all who love a great story because that is what you can find in the pages of this novel.

The author did a great job in this beautiful, rhyming book for children. How fun is it to either let a child read this book or read it aloud to them with its' sing song text that is such a delight. The pictures are adorable and the story is not only fun, but teaches us all that there is a place where we can join in and feel we truly belong and can be happy. Great book to add to a child's treasury!

This is a great collection of thought provoking stories. The author is what I like to call Reader friendly. The stories flow and you find yourself turning page after page and hoping the stories never end. This also means the author has done an amazing job in making the stories a quick read because of a great writing style. Each of the stories left me with easier a smile or an awed expression and that means this author did his job by writing enjoyable short stories with just the right quirky twist.

An interesting read that takes readers into the life of Annabelle and her husband, Evan, who is not quite the man Annabelle always dreamed of sweeping her off her feet. Instead Evan is a money hungry a manipulator who will stop at nothing to get what he wants. This book is an intriguing read and one that reminds me of so many people I know who are in abusive relationships and trying to find a way out. The author did a great job with this psychological thriller.

I hope you are ready for a thrill ride of espionage, conspiracy and of course greed from world leaders of several countries. The author does an amazing job with this novel, although I haven;t read the first two books this one stands alone and is a compelling read. It also makes me want to grab the first two books in this series. Th author has done his homework and knows a lot about what is going on behind the scenes of the agencies involved in all the countries. I found this book to be one I could read again and again and seems to be one that could have fell out of the news headlines.

I am a fan of the Glenn Trust series of Hunter books, The first three have been amazing and I can't wait to move on to four and five and maybe more? The author has such an amazing talent of describing locations and character development and does a beautiful job with his compelling reads. All books in this series are worthy of five star ratings!

I have read two the other books in this series and like them, this book is another amazing thrill ride. The author does an amazing job with descriptions of the locale in his books that readers feel they are right there and involved in the murders and mystery of this author's amazing stories, I have another couple of  books to finish up this amazing series and hope the stories will continue!

I think this is a keeper for anyone who has children, the pictures are beautiful and bright and will keep children glued to the pages.The author makes kindergarten a fun place for young ones to look forward to. If you have kids or grand kids getting ready for school, this is a great book to help them make that scary transition and fun to share.

Interesting book for kids and adults to share teaching a bit of common sense and a fun story. The pictures are actual photographs that should up children's curiosity and give ebven more topics to share and learn about.

I found this an interesting an informative read. When you think Taoism all began in 600 B.C. it is amazing.Tao Te Ching is a teaching book that lets people learn about the sacred teachings of the Far East. An interesting background is given about James Legge and Max Muller who put together the book of 50 volumes of these teachings. I think this is a book to keep handy and read over and over again. The beautiful thoughts hold a lot of common sense in how to be a better person and make this world a better place, something we could all try to use in our every day lives. The writing gives a sense of peace and is a great guideline for living life to its' fullest and to bring out the best in us all. No matter what religion you have or don't have this is a fascinating book.

I read some of the reviews and grab the book anyway because I love James Patterson. For me this was an intriguing look at life and what has happened to our world. I also found this an interesting take on what possibilities are for us if we don't change. I found the characters to be people I would meet in the occupations they are in and felt the author did a great job with them. All in all I found this a great read and think the reader has to take a look at what the author is saying in the warnings that come with the damage done. I am still a James Patterson fan. As a side note I also watched the series, but feel a readers imagination combined with the writers is always the best choice.

I am a huge fan of Darla Hogan's short story collections. If you are a writer and want to know hiw to write a short story the right way, read this author's works. The stories are amazing and keep the reader hanging on until the last word. They also have a tendency to stay with you days after reading and that, dear readers is exactly how it should be done! Darla Hogan has an amazing talent for making each short story feel like a book and is able able to leave readers a bit spooked and highly entertained. Thanks to the author for yet again an amazing collection of short stories that will be read over and over again.

Interesting read. The author discusses many religions and tells a bit about each. I can see she did her home work and did a lot of research for this short book. I also liked the fact that the author didn't run down any religion and feels it is a personal choice. Well done Non-fiction read that readers will find useful and helpful as they try to figure out religion and mysticism for themselves, not an easy job.

I only wish it was longer, bu the author has an amazing talent of painting pictures with a few words, some are a bit dark, some enlightening. All in all a great collection of poems that will make you think and see the authors words as they open pictures in your mind.

When Archaeologist Ed Weaver goes to Ireland and digs up a large cube of what appears to be marble,the adventure of a lifetime begins. With no backing for this project available, Ed reluctantly takes money from a billionaire who lives in Texas. Even though Ed doesn't trust Bill Bronoski,he feels the project and what is inside the cube are going to be worth the trade off. The story from here takes the readers on a magnificent journey that combines history, religion and technology in a fascinating and unique way.The author's vivid imagination has brought a story to readers that is hard to put down and unforgettable in the best way.

A well written short story that takes readers into the life of Jane Smith,a young woman with no family who is just trying to finish college and start a life for herself. The best way for her to make money in order to build her life is by being an exotic dancer. While dancing she meets a Prince and her life is turned upside down. A few twists and turns make this romance an interesting read.
