Great for when I power walk or when I just want great sound from my mp3s or watching Netflix on my tablet.In all fairness I was provided these free of charge in exchange for a fair and unbiased review, and that's what I have given.

Being an Eric England fan I've known and heard about this film for a couple of years. I finally got to see it.(Ace Marrero) and (Katie Stegeman) who are no strangers to England's films play Dan and Mindy Summers.A married couple with a baby on the way.They're on the way to Dan's sisters house when they are trapped in the clutches of a madman with a high powered rifle. When asked why ? by Dan,the man says. Why not! From here they have to do whatever it takes to try and survive which includes not freezing to death as it is Christmas eve.While I found it entertaining and the acting quite good it just felt a little hollow. I thought seeing as it was mostly dialogue, the dialogue could have been sharper .It did had some very tense moments a feeling of dread and some nice camera angles.This is definitely not England's shining moment but it's better than a lot of low budget thrillers I've seen recently. As far as gore, it's not that kind of party but there is one scene with a splatter! If I were flipping channels and started watching this, I have to say I would stay on that channel to see the outcome.I also loved the song during the end credits.

This is my favorite lip color for daytime.The product stays on nicely but tends be be a bit dry feeling so I just use a little clear gloss or if I want to keep the matte finish, I just use some chap stick on top!It's great for that nude pouty look.The price is right too.

I love horror films  where the villains are creepy, religious fanatic family members,and this was certainly one of those .These very messed up siblings take it upon themselves to capture and "purge" so called Dirty Girls of their sins. The methods they use are very brutal and deadly.It seems the siblings were terrorized and tortured as children by their schizophrenic mother in the name of the Lord, which are recounted in flashbacks. The cast was well balanced and the acting quite good. (Kaylee DeFer) as Michelle being the main focus.The reason she is being punished  is because she was driving drunk and her boyfriend and 2 other people were killed as the result.I found it to he engaging enough but it lacked some depth and logic, which I usually don't mind but this had the makings of a really good film. The gore was about a 4 on a scale of 1-10 but at least what they did have was done Decently.There are some scenes of torture that include a power drill and box cutter.I would recommend it for a rental.It actually only had a running time of about 70 minutes of movie.

I'm conflicted about this film. There are many good points but unfortunately some areas that are not so good.To me, it seemed as it didn't quite know what it wanted to be and commit to it.Just when I started taking the plot seriously there would be something that pulled me back to (oh, OK, it's like this). Meaning it was somewhat of a parody or mockumentary there is  even some "found footage ".It makes fun of while also sympathizing with the way people that were deemed crazy in the 1960s were treated while in state asylums. There are dreamlike sequences that in my opinion are the bright spots of the film. (Guy Edmonds)  plays our main character George Kilner,who voluntarily commits himself into the asylum without knowing the horrors that await him.Edmond's acting is another bright spot.He really takes us were the role takes him.(Gary Boulter) as Cutter was believeable as well.There is also some sketchy acting, I won't hurt feelings by saying the main, mood killer! Because you can be into a movie and a wooden performance can take you right back out of it. I found it entertaining and certainly wasn't bored because it certainly has its clever moments and points. There was a lot of violence and torture that was effective and disturbing but the gore effects were pretty weak.There are scenes of rape and also mentions and recountings of child sexual molestation.George's perverted uncle whom we see in flashbacks is very creepy and disturbing but then again anything to do with child molestation skeeves me out. If you like any kind of films dealing with asylums or mental illness this will be right up your  alley .As a film about the horrors of the treatment of mentally ill patients, it works but as a slasher not so much.I think the director (Chew Barker) has a bright future ahead of him and for his first film did an admirable job!

This film revolves around a couple who's car breaks down along the Irish countryside ,who then stumble upon an old farmhouse that leaves much to be desired in the lighting department.In a flashback the farmhouse owner has exumed some sort of undead creature who then starts stalking them. The creature is really creepy even though we never get a really good look at him except for a couple of shadowy face shots.His figure, presense and sound are quite frightening .It seems the only thing he is frightened of is light and the couple have very little except a dying flashlight, cellphone, one lamp in the farmhouse and some candles. There is some nicely done gore but not a lot ,also the lighting in the film is nicely done but some things are meant to be hard to see or left to one's imagination.I won't give anything else  away as not to spoil .I found it to be fast moving and attention keeping even making me wince and clutch my pearls a few times. (Niamh Algar) as Sarah was perfect and Sarah is one tough chick!

This was such a sweet and inspiring film. I'm so glad they used  transgender actress (Michelle  Henley) instead of using non transgender actresses as they have in the past. As Ricky, Michelle was a joy to watch, as was (Michael Welch) as Robby her best friend since the age of Six. Welch really put his heart into this role and didn't let anything hold him back.All the actors were great and I was emotionally invested in each of them for different reasons.This story takes place in a small town where everyone knows Ricky is Trans but most everyone treats her with respect. It's basically a love story with a couple of twists and secrets.I thought the actress who played Ricky was very brave to do a full frontal nude scene as a preoperative transgender woman, it wasn't gratuitous but needed for the scene to be impactive.There are a lot of dynamics explored, such as, am I gay if I sleep with a pre op transsexual ? Am I straight if, I, as a pre op transsexual,sleep with a woman ? etc. It seems confusing but it is dealt with in a respectful and graceful manner.It made me weepy in certain spots but sometimes it was an (oh that's so sweet)  kind of weepy. As a transgender woman, myself, who had the surgery in 2000, I recommend this film whole heartedly.

Synopsis :The story is about a bartender, a desperate woman who might or might not be playing everyone. A murdered drug dealer, the son of a billionaire and a brother that will do whatever it takes to find and exact justice on whomever killed "his" brother.The film revolves around August (Columbus Short) who also narrates quite a bit of the film. (Wilmer Valderrama) was excellent as Angel the gang banger looking for brother Jesus ,who was Murdered.The big question and the mystery is by whom?We never know who's telling the truth or who's lying as each story becomes more complicated and at the time makes sense.There's violent content but nothing over the top gory.I found it to be an entertaining thriller/mystery with Great acting and a well written script.

Synopsis :The story is about a bartender a desperate woman who might or might not be playing everyone. A murdered drug dealer, the son of a billionaire and a brother that will do whatever it takes to find and exact justice on whomever killed "his" brother.The film revolves around August (Columbus Short) who also narrates quite a bit of the film. (Wilmer Valderrama) was excellent as Angel the gang banger looking for brother Jesus ,who was Murdered.The big question and the mystery is by whom?We never know who's telling the truth or who's lying as each story becomes more complicated and at the time makes sense.There's violent content but nothing over the top gory.I found it to be an entertaining thriller/mystery with Great acting and a well written script.

Nightlight is pretty fresh for the Type of film it is.I was impressed that they did what they did with so little! There was some moments that really worked.I have to say this movie creeped me out and I was scared, and that never happens.The cast was good as was the acting.The POV shots were effective and the lighting and lack there of provided some of the best thrills and chills.There was no gore to speak of but there was violence and some disturbing images.The actors were all very attractive, so we had something nice to look at.I thought it was a clever film and definitely worth a watch.Make sure you watch the beginning and the ending carefully. The ending is quite powerful!

Digging Up The Marrow was much more fun than I had anticipated. Adam Green is hilarious as himself in what is basically a mockumentary about a strange man William Dekker played to perfection by veteran actor(Ray Wise) .Dekker claims to know of an underground world of Monsters called "The Marrow" that he has been keeping tabs on for years.Everyone from Green's wife to Victor Crowley himself (Kane Hodder) make appearances in the film as themselves as well. I found it to be quite clever and fresh,but  was surprised that there was no gore seeing as it was an Adam Green film. Dekker enlists Green to document his findings but has very ridged and paranoid rules attached to the project.It took quite awhile to get through the silly stuff to the horror aspect of the film.When it did it was quite chilling and left an quite an impression on me. I enjoyed this film very much. It's one that you will either really like or not! Green certainty found some not so subtle ways to plug his movies too.

This was a 29 minute short film about an abusive husband who kills his pregnant wife. While in Utero their baby seems to be taking notes as her Father beats and kills her MotherFlash forward 10 years and his daughter seems to have taken on the spirit of her mother and murders her father the same way he murdered her mother. Not very inspiring ororiginal. The acting was sketchy as well except for the woman who played the pregnant wife. She was good.

The Barber is a mystery/thriller  about a serial killer named (Francis Visser) living in a small town in the guise of a meek barber named "Eugene" played flawlessly by Scott Glen. Chris Coy's subtle performance as "John McCormick" son of the detective who was obsessed with the Francis Visser case, until he blew his own brains out due to his frustration with Visser never being convicted or punished for his crimes of torturing and burying women alive.John comes to the small town looking for Eugene/Francis,but what are John's true intentions? This is something that comes to light when the plot allows.This is a slow burn thriller that keeps you own your toes and enthralled .There are enough twists and turns to make one Dizzy.The cat and mouse between Eugene and John is quite entertaining to watch but plays out evenly, without seeming too far fetched because everything ties together quite brilliantly.The ending gave me great satisfaction and closure.

This was a much anticipated movie for me, I was excited after I read about it and saw the trailer.Think "Open Water" but switch it up with The woods and a Bear.I won't go into much because of spoilers.This movie had me glued to the screen from the first frame mostly due to it's beautiful lush scenery,the amazing acting and realism.The two main characters"Alex" and "Jenn" played flawlessly by Jeff Roop and Missy Peregrym are the only people focused on except an encounter with a Mysterious drifter type "Brad" Eric Balfour.This makes the movie all the more endearing because it makes us as viewers feel, up close and personal to them.The gore and brutality was at slasher status and so uncomfortable to watch. The music was perfect and helped build the intensity of each moment.A must See!

This Indonesian slasher film took me by surprise as to how good it was. It's reminiscent of the French slasher "Frontiers".It boasts all the cliches that I have come to love in these cannibalistic gore fests. The girl in need that leads the lambs to the slaughter.The strange family members,creepy house etc.This had an element of the supernatural that was shown on camera but never explained but had to do with The very youthful mother named "Dara".One of the now captive people is "Astrid" a pregnant woman very close to her due date, and Dara is determined to get her baby, so this reminded me of another French film "inside".There are some great cat and mouse moments filled with blood, gore, chainsaws and everything that is slasher fabulous!What really makes this movie work so well besides the aforementioned is that I really cared what happened to them.

The first hour of this film is very slow moving as they try to build character development for the six lead characters.The acting is good but most of the characters are uninspiring.They take a group picture at the beginning of their trip, which in these movies is always the kiss of death.The six of them go to spend the weekend at a cabin near a lake Somewhere in Finland. After about an hour into the movie they realize they're being stalked by someone or something. There are a few boring kills with little or no effects.They have no electricity or phone service so they decide to take off into the woods to find help.There is some creep factor to it but for this type of film they needed some gore. If I told you what was killing them, it might be a spoiler. Even though I'm not even certain what it was supposed to be,myself ! The last 30 minutes wasn't bad but they didn't take us anywhere we haven't been before, or anywhere I really wanted to revisit.

This is the best kept secret I've discovered in awhile. I had no clue this film existed until yesterday. As a lover of Disco and slasher flims I feel like I won lottery .It's certainly not a masterpiece but for some like me it is a gem. The story is about a guy who had a very traumatic experience while disco type music was playing, so now, when he hears it he goes insane and murders and mutilates women. I'm really glad I got to experience Discopath.I think it's essential viewing for retro slasher lovers.This is a gore fest and the effects are really well done. At times I actually forgot I was watching a movie that was made in 2013,It felt so much like a film from 1980.In certain scenes it had a  Dario Argentina feel to it, like when the woman was in the corridor and her dress was blowing.The music was authentic as well, with tracks from Ronnie Griffith,Walter Murphy, Kiss,KC & TheSunshine Band and more Disco faves.

This is a huge waste of time. They should have called it, (Everything You've Ever Wanted To Know About Bigfoot But Were Too Smart To Ask).This boring Mockumentary Is all over the place but no where anyone would want to go. The visuals are lacking as is everything else .The recreated Stories of "what if" were tiresome and ridiculous .They try and sell us on all these theories like Bigfoot is an alien etc. It's actually painful to watch.

X Games was  more of a story driven film than a gore fest although there were very brutal scenes of violence and some gore. It's a little uneven in places and very far fetched but still quite entertaining.We never really know all of the participants in the revenge or exactly who did what to whom until the end of the film.There are some very tense, uncomfortable moments and lots of blood but nothing that ever takes it to torture porn status. I would definitely recommend it to lovers of Asian extreme films or people that don't mind reading subtitles .

I never knew this French horror/Slasher film existed until yesterday.I love French horror and this one was pretty good. It was a bit muddled in spots but it made up for that with Great acting, amazing creature effects and well done gore.The story is somewhat formulaic as we begin with a woman driving down a desolate stretch of road,then wanders into an inn where everyone is weird and people go missing. It has a Gothic feel to it which adds to the creepy atmosphere.From here it gets crazy. There is also a supernatural element to this film that deals with feeding blood to strange ravenous creatures that live underground and come up to feed when the moon is comes out.

The doll is beautiful with her smokey eyes and pale lips. The gown is really fashion forward and more lovely in person.The reason she is so expensive is because Mattel only made 1000 of these dolls ,so she is a Platinum label collector doll.I Iove her, plus she doesn't have that plastic band in the back of her hair to hold her in the box as most dolls do. Just thread, so her hair lays perfectly .

"Nathan Phillips" best known to horror fans for his roles in "Wolf Creek" and "Chernobyl Diaries" Heads up the cast in this film in which there is only about 15 hours left until the world comes to an end by way of fire.He plays James, a seemingly self centered party boy.On his way to the last party ever, where everyone  gets wasted and acts like Sodom and Gomorrah part 2, James stumbles upon Rose "Angourie Rice" a little girl who has been taken by two disgusting pedophiles.He saves her then has to make a moral judgement as to take her to her family or go to the party.From there James and Rose create a bond and encounter all types of inhumane people. There's violence, some very graphic but nothing really slasher film worthy save one scene with a machete. It's a very moving story that is also very frightening because it seems so plausible.Nathan Phillips looks sexier than ever, showing six pack abs and a bit more than that in one scene. This is definitely not a feel good movie but there are moments that restore your faith in mankind when so much madness and debauchery are lurking in every corner.There have been some good movies out of Australia lately with Wolf Creek 2, The Babadook and now, this one. It's not as action packed as the trailer would have you believe, but it's a really good movie with Great character development and beautiful Cinematography .

Muck was basically a vehicle to showcase naked and half naked girls running around with blood all over them. In the beginning I thought they were going to go the straight slasher route with extra T&A. But then it became quite comical, spouting such lines as (if it makes you feel any better ,my car got tossed on the hot chick I was gonna bang tonight).It's also full of Scream-esque horror references and some clever horror film puns.Unfortunately the movie itself is muddled and all over the place.The bald albino creatures are creepy and effective at first but they became somewhat ineffective after being visible for so long. There was a lot of blood splatter but not anything hard core like decapitations or severed limbs.Basically Axes to the chest in darkened lighting and impalement  by pitchfork .Although they do shine in other areas where effects are concerned. Lachlan Buchanan was hilarious as "Troit" an intoxicated dude that's really good at killing these creatures.This movie could go either way .People could really like it or maybe not so much.depends on what you're looking for in a slasher film. If you want lots of T&A, Comic relief and lots of blood splatter then you will love it. If you want a scary slasher flick that plays it straight you won't.I found it to be somewhat entertaining but nothing I would watch again.

"Hunted" is a film that was released in 2012 under the title "Rufus" which I feel is a more fitting title. Regardless of what title it's under,it is a great vampire  film.Rufus shows up in a small town after his very elderly ward delivers him there, she then steps in front of a bus and he is alone.Before she dies he promises her he will try and blend in. He then moves in with a family who lost a son in a terrible accident. The man of the family just happens to be the sheriff,which could either be a blessing or a curse!It's very reminiscent of (Let The Right One In) only The vampire is a boy of about 15 or 16 named Rufus and he finds an understanding girl who lives across the street who falls in love with him. This really isn't a horror film but more of a Thriller/Drama although there is a fair amount of blood in some scenes.The rest of the film is very moving as Rufus tries to blend in and feed his hunger too. He's very much like the HBO character Dexter in that he only feeds on people that are bad or a danger to him or someone he loves.A mysterious stranger comes to the small town soon after Rufus arrives and he has an agenda and it isn't a pleasant one.All the performances were good but "Rory J Saper" as Rufus was amazing and heart tugging. This is a vampire film with heart and it has a nice soundtrack too. I will buy this and re watch it because I found the characters endearing and I cared what happened to them.I love this film.

This has to be the best horror film I have seen so far this year!Think "I Spit On Your Grave" meets "Dead Girl".There is no down time, the film starts off with a bang and doesn't let up.Although it's very racially offensive, it only serves as a catalyst for us to hate all the more, the gang of rednecks that Kill Indians for sport, use the N word and kidnap, rape and brutalize our Heroine "Zoe" played flawlessly by Amanda Adrienne.This has gore galore and very well done gore at that. I was amazed at the production value of this film. The lighting was amazing and reminded me of the film (Borderland) .All of the acting was above average as well.After this ordeal Zoe has one thing on her mind, Revenge! I's a lot of fun watching her get it too.I highly highly recommend this film. It's what we as slasher/horror lovers have been waiting for this year. I don't want to give more of the movie away than the synopsis does,but I will tell you there's an awesome chainsaw duel.I'm in no way affiliated with this film, I have over 400 reviews and most are horror.

I am putting this in my storage area to keep my out of season clothes.  I'm so glad I found this because after last season I couldn't find so many things and just can't remember where I put them all,  This is a perfect solution and the price is amazing for what you get.  It's very easy to set up and the clothes are protected.  If it lasts and is durable, I will probably get more for each family member. This would also be good in an area where you don't have enough closet space and you need something until you can get something more permanent. What a great product I didn't even know I needed.

Reading that study they cite that this combo has proven just as effective as nsaids was just what I needed to see.  I've been having horrible joint pain this past year and I just can't take nsaids.  They kill my stomach and all of the studies that show they cause heart problems are enough to completely scare me away. I love that these come in capsules and I intend to stick with these for a while to see if I can get all of these joints back under control.  Great combination and I'm so glad I was able to try these.

I really hate to take meds anymore because it always seems the side effects are almost as bad as the illness.  I usually do a saline solution in the nose and I use a steamer to help with the chest and sinuses.  Because I'm doig those as well, it's hard to see how much of the change is from this or from the combination.  It seems to be working and I'm not noticing any side effects.  So far so good.

This is so pretty.  It's not a heavy duty ornament.  It's pretty light weight.  What makes it so beautiful though are the lights that flash through the little stars in the body of the bear.  It's just so festive and gorgeous.  I can't wait to put it on my tree this year.  It will certainly be front and center.

This is a great multifunctional light vacuum.  It was very easy to put together and easy to use.  It's top heavy so it can't stand on its own.  Fortunately they have a holder you can put up which I will be doing very quickly.  I've used it on vinyl, hardwoods and area rugs so far and it's done a very good job.  I like the easy of carrying it around.  I'm very tired of lugging the heavy vacuums around the house.

This blanket is so warm and it feels fantastic.  It's very comfortable and heats quickly and across this whole blanket.  At the same time I got this one, however, I also got the plush.  That one is just so so soft.  So if you want a super soft blanket, go ahead and spend a few extra dollars and go with the plush.  If you just want the warmth and aren't going to have this directly on your skin, save the money and go with this model.  It's an awesome blanket and mine will be getting a lot of use this winter.

When I read the synopsis of this book, I was on the fence about whether or not I wanted to read it.  However, I've read Albom's other books and enjoyed all of them so I thought I'd give it a shot.  Boy am I glad I did.  Not only is the writing great, but this is absolutely his best so far. The thoughts are unique and original and I was just pulled into this world of music and into Frankie's world.  This is a character you will care about and it will make you think about your own life and the meaning of everything around you.  I know Albom's books are always thought provoking in that sense.  However, this book is just different from the others and you have to read it to understand.  I absolutely loved it.

This is perfect for a child's room which is where I'm putting this.  The mattress isn't too large and although it's memory foam, it still feels firm so you don't sink.  It comes in a box, is wrapped in plastic and was delivered very quickly.  It feels like great quality for the price.  I was so glad to be able to throw out that old traditional mattress.

This is a very attractive men's watch.  It's a little more conservative so you can wear it with your dress clothes or with casual wear.  It can be dressed up or dressed down so that's a real plus.  It's not too thick or too thin.  The second photograph that shows how it fits on the wrist is just right.  The links are substantial and feel like a very good quality.  The price is comparable with other similar watches.  It's a good looking timepiece that would be a nice gift.

This blanket is so very comfortable. The blanket is the ultimate in softness with the microfleece. It heated very quickly and maintains a comfortable warmth at the setting where you put it.  I actually am sitting under it now - the warmth helps pain in my legs so I like to use even when I'm not too cold. There are two controls and they are very user friendly.  I was able to use them without any problem.  Each has its own a/c adapter so you will plug into 2 different outlets for the one blanket.  The one I received actually looks much lighter to me than it does in the photograph.  It is an off white - an ivory.  I've had a blanket similar to this and though I loved it a lot, it didn't last as long as I had hoped.  I think longevity will be the key to this one.  I will update and let you know if there are any issues at all.

This stuff is fabulous.  My granite is about 8 years old now and it hasn't been looking its best lately.  I've used many different products on it over the years and this is without a doubt the best so far.  It looks renewed and it looks so shiny and clean.  And for me, one of the best parts is no real smell.  I have chemical sensitivities and am sensitive to fragrances and this doesn't bother me at all.  Thank goodness!  Love this product!

I have an enormous amount of ginger growing in my front yard and in my back yard so I seem to have a never ending supply of it.  Often, I just don't want to bother with it. I like to use it for tea and in my smoothies -so many recipes call for it and you see the anti-inflammatory health benefits of it constantly.  Enter this little gadget.  After I ordered it I wasn't sure that I would use it but I'm happy that I have it now.  It's not too large and doesn't take up too much space.  It is very pretty and reasonably priced and it works well.  If you use ginger enough it is a product worth purchasing.  You can throw it in the dishwasher which is great.  I hope I will use ginger more now that I have this because I need the benefits of it.

These are such great products whether you want to use as  nanny cam, a pet monitor or just a home check.  My sister has one and she uses the 2 way communication to talk to her dog throughout the day.  I use this to monitor my home and check on my pets.  I've had other brands before but the difference with this one is that you can move it where you need it without the cord.  You can charge it and put it where you want to.  Also, you can watch what happened through the day.  The other brands I have also have that ability but they charge you.  If I wanted to keep paying I could pay a monitoring company but I'm not interested in doing that.  So those two things make this product superior.The setup is easy and you can watch quickly what took place during the day.  If you are concerned what's going on in your home but don't have time to keep checking all day this is perfect.  The night vision works well but I find that so with most of the brands.  Overall, this is a great product with the extra features I mentioned that make it just a little better than the others.

I have been watching the ads for this game for a few weeks and I just couldn't wait to play it.  It did not disappoint.  The setup is great.  I love the characters and the environment makes it fun.  The setting is different and when you think everything's been done an you've played it all before, you get a nice surprise.  I love anything historical so this makes the challenge even better.  I'm not bothered by any so called bugs I've seen.It's just plain fun to me.  I look forward to playing it a lot more.  Great improvement with this new AC series.

I was beyond thrilled to get this Deebot.  I have a dog that sheds so badly it is impossible to keep my dark hardwoods clean.  It would require sweeping at least twice a day and I don't have the time or energy to do that.  This is soooooo easy.  The only con so far is that the little debris tank fills up pretty quickly but I think that is because the vast amount of hair this dog and cat shed.  I don't mind dumping it though since I don't have to vacuum or sweep myself.  It's not totally perfect.  It does miss some spaces but overall this is my dream product.  I can't think of many things I'd rather have than this because it just saves times.  You can schedule it to clean at a specific time schedule as well so you don't even have to turn it on and you don't have to be embarrassed by your floors when someone shows up unannounced.!

There is a vast amount of information in this book.  At some points, you feel like you're reading a textbook and others just very helpful information to deal with injuries to the brain and mental illness.  There is so much in depth information that you will feel like you need to go back and reread it, which I did.  And I thought wow I don't remember reading that before.  I have a friend who has struggled with mental illness and I called and discussed this with him and he is already planning to go to the Amen Clinic and have a workup done.  This book is fascinating and is a great resource.

Several years ago I purchased the online access to Rosetta Stone.  I don't know if that is still available but the months went by and I ended p paying a lot of money.  I actually don't think there is much difference between that and this....the features that I remember re all comparable.  I didn't end up using it enough.  Really, you should just pay for what you need and I believe this is what I need.  I took a year of Spanish in college and I just don't remember enough and I need to learn it now.  I can't wait to see how quickly I progress with this.  I will update.  If you are trying to decide which software to buy, I definitely recommend this.  I don't have a DVD drive on this computer, so I just downloaded it and entered the code on the sticker in the package,  It was very easy.  Great product.

This is a very pretty set that could be used for a casual get together or an elegant affair.  The photo makes it appear a little more fancy than it actually looks and feels.  When mine arrived, the pepper shaker had once clean break on it but Amazon sent another new one.  The box wasn't damaged at all and it was packed well, so I think it is jut one of those things that can happen when you ship breakable items.  The salt and pepper shakers are pretty dainty but the egg plate is very sturdy - there are rivets all around the bottom of it. It's a very nice item that makes you look like the prepared hostess.

This is a bargain for this stick.  It works great, has great reach and you can attach it to your phone so you can wire it that way.  We have several in the house and this one is just as good as any of the others and at such a great price right now. The stick was packaged very well and if you want to give as a gift you can just wrap right up in the box.  There is also a carrying case.  Good product. I received this in consideration for an honest review.

Well, I could immediately tell a difference in my nails after taking this.  They have shot out.  I know I have issues.  My hair is terribly thin and my nails are often weak.  They look gorgeous right now.  I can't tell with my hair yet but will update if I notice any real change.  So far it works great with the nails though.  The taste isn't bad at all and I preder vitamins like this - in powder form - I think I absorb them much better.

These are good, sturdy gloves that don't impede your ability to work with your hands.  I bought a box of these before and had been a little concerned that they might be irritating to me sense I seem to have allergic reactions to just about everything.  These did not bother me at all, nothing like vinyl and latex.  One of the things is that they have no smell, no chemical smell and no fragrant smell.  Great gloves and plenty in the box.

This is a very advanced digital painting software with a steep learning curve for those who are new to it.  The new features for this version add even more dimension to the software and they have video tutorials that explain them in detail and show what you can do with them.  They all are on youtube and you can watch them prior to purchasing if you want to.  The great thing about this software is that is has so many features - just a vast expanse of abilities for any artist to exploit in any format.  If you have a lot of knowledge of artistic technique, you will probably pick this up pretty quickly.  If you are a novice or have moderate ability, there will be a much steeper learning curve.  However, if you put in the time, you will be able to create some amazing work in any format you desire.  I admit I've watched numerous video tutorials so far and I'm only able to scratch the surface of what this software can do.  I'm in it for the long haul though and I expect to get better.  I just have to get the knack for the digital combined with the traditional art.  I will say the new audio expressions is a strange addition.  For the professional artist, I'm not sure that this will seem much more than a neat little gimmick but the addition of the speckles will provide much more depth and is worth having in the digital art repertoire.  This is an amazing software and I believe anyone who considers themselves an artist today would be lacking without this in their painter's arsenal.

This is a good combination for headache....I think this probably contains the best ingredients and I don't mind any of them.  Make sure you're okay with having caffeine.  The flavor is ok.  I'm fine with it.  My sister didn't like it so much, but I think it's better than the regular flavors of powdered headache medicine.  This was only a 4 pack that I tested so I'd probably rather have one with a few more in it, but this is a good pack to carry around in your purse for when one of the bad ones hit. I see that the regular shipment of this will give you many more so that should be great. Th little packs of powder are typical of these and of you don't want to carry around the whole box, you can slip a few in your purse pocket too.

NOTE:*****They have posted the wrong photograph with this watch.  The description is correct but the photo that goes with this watch is on the following link - and this photo should go on that link with that description (they've gotten the 2 mixed up): Invicta Women's 21536 Pro Diver Analog Display Quartz Gold Watch  So if you want the blue face - go to that description and purchase.The watch I received is the white face and bezel.  It is pictured at the link above and is an absolutely beautiful  I was afraid it might be thick and bulky because you just can't tell from a photograph but it is not like that at all.  It is dainty and feminine but very good quality - not too thin but not bulky and fits so nicely on the wrist.The presentation is fantastic.  If you want to send this as a gift, you should feel very comfortable in doing so.  It has a very high end feel to it and comes in a large watch box that is in an elegant cardboard gift box.  It comes with the little polishing cloth and everything is sealed nicely.  I was actually stunned when I opened the box because it was much prettier than I expected and exceeded my expectations.  Great watch - absolutely beautiful.

My city water is the worst. I usually just buy cases of plastic water bottles but decided to give this a try when I got the opportunity.  I am tired of lugging those cases around and I drink an enormous amount of water.  The water in my city is so gross that my refrigerator filter just doesn't give me security enough.  So I've decided to take the water from the fridge and put it through this pitcher.  Hopefully this will last long enough to make it worth it to me financially.  I know it's a lot more convenient.  Setting it up was quick and easy.  Waiting for the water to drain thru the filter does take a little time - it isn't instant, but it's not bothersome.  It's working well so far and the water tastes good.

I was confused at what I would be getting when I read the reviews for this.  Some said it is so thick and strong and some said too thin.  My verdict: somewhere in the middle.  It feels sturdy and secure but not super thick and not tin and plastic cheap feeling as some of these I've had are.  It's cute and looks just as it does in the picture and is a good size.  If you've bought these at the store before, this is pretty typical of what you get there.  This is an adequate price point and it will help you tote those groceries on your market trip.

I wanted to get this and let my 77 year old father give this a try.  I was a little concerned that it didn't fit his car that great.  You can get it in there though and it still provided support.  I'm not sure if that's okay but he seemed quite satisfied and the flashlight worked fine.
This is absolutely beautiful  It is so much prettier in person than even on the photograph.  It's small but makes such a nice decorative accent to my home.  Love it!

This is a very small coffee table that looks great and is an even better buy.  I was afraid something this inexpensive wouldn't look that great but it absolutely does.  It's easy to put up and only took about 5 minutes.  I've seen some complaints about its reliability over a long period but I wll update if I have any issues.  So far it looks great and was a great purchase.

These are very pretty and dainty earrings.  They are smaller than they look in the photograph but you won't be disappointed if you adjust your expectations to understand that.  These don't dangle at the ball but hang nicely.  These would make a great gift for any woman.

These razors are a good value.  These products have become so expensive over the past few years that I appreciate a good value on them.  It's a nice basic razor without a lot of extras you can see on some of them - like moisturizers.  That's okay and I'm fine with these.  I will admit I don't feel I get as smooth a shave as with some others I have tried (while I'm actually shaving) but they do the job and the shave is actually a very close shave which leaves my legs more smooth after the fact.  I like this product and can see myself preferring this to other more expensive options.

The first thing I will say about these tables is they are tiny, and I do mean tiny. However, if you've priced nightstands and end tables lately you know you can spend a small fortune for one.  I went back and forth between 3 and 4 stars and I'd give it somewhere in the middle.  It's great that you can get 2 tables for this price but they are so short and you have to be ready to assemble them as well.  I am posting a picture so you can see it in relation to the bed.  It is actually a pretty good value.  The key is to set your expectation for what you will get.

You just can't beat this for the price.  I didn't expect much and almost talked myself out of purchasing this, but decided it was cheap enough for me to go ahead and give it a shot.  I'm glad I did.  It is very sturdy and looks great.  I can't think of anything else I would have gotten that would be better than this for the cost.  I'm posting a pic so you can see how it looks after I put it together.  I'm not great at assembly and it took just about half an hour.  If you want a nice look that doesn't look cheap and  you don't have a lot of money, this is a great choice.

I'll start by saying I don't mind the flavor of these at all.  It's a little like banana with a veggie aftertaste.  I wouldn't have even thought anything about it had I not looked at some of the reviews and seen that as the primary complaint.  I like Garden of Life supplements and take the Primal Defense probiotics. I've been using that along with digestive enzymes for a few years now.  After spending nearly 20 years on meds like Prevacid, I hardly need them anymore.  I wouldn't have thought it possible but this combination seems to be very good for my very bad tummy.  The change doesn't take place overnight.  It takes months and you hardly notice the effect until you quit taking it and suddenly feel terrible or you just realize one day, wow I feel so much better and  don't even need an antacid.That has been my experience with enzymes.  I wanted to say that because I have tried different brands of enzymes and they are definitely not all the same, especially with my preferred brands of supplements.  Some don't seem to work at all.  What's important to know is that it takes time to take effect and just be patient as long as you aren't having any negative effects. I'll keep taking these and see how I'm feeling by the time I finish the bottle or update if I have to quit taking for some reason.  I very much like that these are organic whole foods in here and non-GMO verified as well as gluten free, soy free and dairy free with no sugars, preservatives, artificial sweeteners or fillers added.  I tend to react to a lot of those things so it's important they not have that.  So far it seems like a great product and I will update.

Wow!  I bought this small vacuum primarily because of the great reviews on here and I'm so glad I did.  I couldn't agree more.  It is fantastic.  It has a shockingly strong amount of suction.  It just gets up everything.  I was expecting it to work well, but nor this well.  I'm so glad I made this purchase.  I'm using it on a hard floor and on carpet.  Great buy and highly recommended.

I ordered 2 of these and really like their appearance.  The lamp looks very sleek and modern, which s what I was gong for.  It is very small so make sure you look at the dimensions and are getting just what you want.  Overall, I really like these and am happy with my purchase.
These are just as beautiful in person as they look on here  So glad I made the choice to get these. I have them on a dark colored couch and they look fantastic.  Great purchase at a great price.

You dissolve these tablets under your tongue.  They dissolve.  I love chamomile because I have allergies to everything and sometimes it seems like the only thing that can calm my system down.  I only use chamomile soap because it doesn't irritate and redden my skin and seems to calm it and I drink the tea to calm me some evenings.  I didn't even know these tablets exist.  I saw that about helping rheumatic pain and decided I needed to give it a try.  I had not heard of this for helping with that before either and did a little research as a result.  It seems literature is mixed on whether this ha a significant impact or not.  But I've been in a mighty flare lately and need to try what I can.  It does have a calming effect but I will wait til I've taken a while longer to see if it has an impact on the rheumatic pain and will update.  I have a feeling it will probably be specific to each individual taking it but I will know for myself soon.  For now, it is definitely recommended for irritability.

I fully expected not to like this very much and yet I do  The idea of no more brown cardboard ending up on my bathroom floor and crowding the garbage can is very appealing to me.  The container is more compact and thus it's easier to carry and it fits just fine o the toilet paper holder.  If you are ocd about having a perfectly round toilet paper roll, you might not like this.  Otherwise, it's just as good as the traditional roll.  I haven't purchased Northern in a long time but this was very soft and I liked the toilet paper itself. I just hope they may lower the price a little along with it  A+ all around.

This little doll is precious and the accessories are a great addition for a lot of fun.  It's cute in the picture here but it is so much prettier in person.  It' very real looking and the eyes are so cute they way they open and close.  This would just be mesmerizing for a little child.....and great to carry around and nurture.  This is one you can't go wrong with.

Wow, this is a huge juicer.  I have been juicing for about 10 years now and have owned many juicers.  This by far has the largest chute and strainer of any of them.  I like the pitcher as well.  When I read it had a froth catcher I thought it would be a pain to clean  That has been my experience, but this one is not like that at all. I only wish the pitcher was a little larger.  Most juicers pretty much have the same type of mechanism and this one is like that too so no surprises there.  It has only 2 speeds, but my experience is that's pretty much all I need.  The Breville I've had for about 8 years has 5 and I rarely use any but 1 and 5.  The key to my Breville is that is has lasted so long.  I will be curious to see the reliability of this one.  So far it works great and I have no complaints.  The pulp is a little but drier than this one but this one is faster. The key to juicing is to get it done as quickly as possible so you don't burn out on it and it feels like just a chore.  This helps because of that extra large chute and the great cleaner for the strainer.  Great product.

This is the best relationship book I have ever read.  When I chose this I actually had pretty low expectations and thought this would be a gimmicky little book with a list of 7 quick fixes to make your marriage perfect.  This is not what I thought and is not like that at all.This is years of couples therapy in a small book.  The key is you have to have 2 willing partners who want make their relationship work.  This is great for couples who plan to marry or for those who have been married for 25 years and all those in between.  My suggestion would be to buy one for each partner and have them read and make notes.  I underlined, marked stars and made notes.The marriage therapist who wrote this books treats marriage and this book with all the seriousness it deserves.  This is foundational and will take time but with the investment of that time and effort, you could end up with a very satisfying marriage and partnership that will fulfill you very deeply.  I believe 100% if you do what this author says, you can give yourselves the best chance possible - even in a rocky marriage that seems to be on its last leg.  There are great ideas and examples in here.I wish I could see this author myself.  I read this thinking all was absolutely fine in my marriage.  Yet I realized so much I should be doing and paying attention to.  It points out ways that a marriage can just slip away from you without your even noticing it.I noticed a review that said this isn't for problems right now.  I couldn't disagree more.  Your marriage didn't get into trouble overnight and you won't repair it in one.  But if you will start making changes immediately, I think the dynamic of an entire relationship could change, and ultimately change your life for the better.  If you do this and your marriage still fails, I do believe you can tell yourself you have given it the best shot possible.The basis for the marriage is one that is God based.  The author focuses on that.  Even if you are not real spiritual you can still find meaning with this.  The second chapter discusses this and don't let yourself get scared off by this chapter.  Just keep pushing through.  Even he admits himself there were moments he could get uncomfortable about things, yet you have to keep doing it to see the positive results that you get from just giving it a try.As I said, I read this book slowly and carefully and took notes the whole time.  I'm ready to reread it and focus even more this time.  I have already recommended it to family members and friends and will continue to do so.  I plan to recommend it to as many as possible because I think it's that good and really believe in it.  It's neither shallow nor gimmicky and I think could be life changing for many.  And there are just too many marriages in trouble.  This could be a game changer for you and your whole family.  It may not address your specific problem circumstances, but I believe those will improve by focusing on what he says to in here.  Great book and highly recommend.

My dog will not stop begging for these.  She absolutely loves them and wants more and more.  She has a sensitive stomach but she does fine with these. She's very picky and refused to eat others that were the same brand but she just couldn't get enough of these.  These have great ingredients - she must like sweet potatoes.  I only wish there were more in the bag because these will be gone in a flash.  Great treats.

Well the ingredients in here seem great.  You've got carrots and blueberries among others.  However, my dog just didn't want these.  She wanted to like them.  She wanted to eat them.  Yet she just didn't.  She's pretty picky so that doesn't mean your pup won't like them.  We got some others the same day that were this same brand however, and she went crazy for them.  So, for her, there was something about these.  She ate a few but when I gave her more she just left them and never went back for them.

This is a very nice basic, slim design monitor.  It's perfect if you have a smaller one and are looking to upgrade or if you just have a laptop with a broken screen.  That's how I'm using mine.  My old HP laptop overheated all the time and ended up melting at the attachment for the screen and the screen quit working.  I simply attached the cord (I'm using VGA but there are two types you can use - DVI) and all is well again.  It's that simple.  So if you've broken your screen and have lots of important info on that computer and aren't ready to purchase a whole new system this is a great idea.  The design looks very nice.  Although it doesn't have a touchscreen I have found I truly do just fine without one and don't really need it except on my convertible tablet.  The picture looks great and I have been very satisfied with the reliability of all the Dell products I've gotten over the past couple of years. They had fallen out of favor with me for a few years so I'm very glad things seem to be working so well for me now.

Well, I ended up enjoying this book after all.  I read the first half and didn't like it very much and put it down for a few weeks befire I decided to pick it back up.  The second half of the book was definitely better than the first and I liked where the story went.  It was much more entertaining.  I think the first half could be condensed into much fewer pages and made much more readable.  I didn't even like the characters that much in that part of the book.  Fortunately, the second half redeemed the first and I actually wanted to know what was going to happen and didn't desire to put it down and not finish.  I'm glad I picked it back up - I just wish it hadn't taken so long to get going.

My dog is very picky but she seems to like dog food with venison and she initially inhaled this.  Since that first introduction she seems a little slower about eating it.  So I think she is on the fence about it.  The good news is that it doesn't seem to irritate her sensitive stomach at all and I think she will probably continue to eat it when the soft food isn't there.  When I first gave her this, she chose it over the soft food.  So she may just be being moody about what she wants to eat right now.  The ingredients are satisfactory and I like that the bag seals.  You have to pull the tab on the front of the bag - don't pull the top apart or cut it.  Good food.

My 15 year old ate this up.  He really liked it and I'm happy with the ingredients.  I like the bag that you can keep sealed.  You pull the tab in the front - not cut or pull apart the bag to make that work.  It actually confused me at first.  He seemed to loved it and to do well with it so I am content.

This is a collector's item based of a fashion style called Tokidoki.  This Barbie is the black label edition and when I researched it I noticed the 2011 version of the Tokidoki seems to have appreciated a great deal and is a true collector's piece.  This doll is a little loud and reminds me of the 80s style and colors combined with now - with the bright tattoos on her and her fashionista persona.  The little accessories you see her holding in the photos come with this.  It's a memorable and distinctive Barbie.

I stay dehydrated from a medical condition and my body just can't tolerate my heater in the winter.  Consequently, I use room heaters.  Some can still be very drying while others can be fire hazards.  After researching a lot of types, I've discovered these are very good for not drying you out so badly and not exposing things in the room to being burned on its elements.  I bought a couple that were a different brand a few years ago and paid 3 times as much for each - they worked great but didn't last very long and I was disappointed.  The price on this model is great and I really can't tell any difference from the ones that cost a lot more.  The key for me will be how long they last too. This unit heats the room very will and it is very convenient.  And thank goodness no assembly required.  When I read it had little wheels, I was certain I would have to put those on at least but I didn't and I was thrilled about that. And as I said, it's not as drying as the forced air heat.  This one actually says moist heat on the box.  I wouldn't go that far but it is much better and I'm thrilled with this unit so far. It looks nice too and blends in with the furniture instead of sticking out like a sore thumb. I will update on longevity and let you know if there are any reliability issues.

I love the idea of witch hazel and minerals to nourish the hands.  This product feels great and moisturizes.  And I'm always lacking in minerals from an illness so I want to replenish any way I can which makes products like these invaluable to me.  There's one big caveat  - the scent.  I feel like a broken record in my beauty reviews lately.  If I want to wear perfume, I will.  Please don't put strong fragrances in products like these - maybe a very light scent that's almost imperceptible to others.  There are so many of us who are sensitive to fragrances and we are usually the ones looking for nourishment like this.  It's a great product but probably not for those who are sensitive  if you don't mind though, you will probably love this combination and want to give it 5 stars.

This was a very enjoyable read and I kept wanting to pick it back up every time I had to put it down.  I liked the characters.  They were unique and not the typical HR hero and heroine.  I've read so many of these that it's hard for me to find some that I really enjoy but I did with this one.  The characters had some heavy emotional issues that guide the story.  It's a story that pulls the reader in right away and keeps you until the end.  I thought the heroine's age should have been a little older in the beginning to be a little more believable to be everlasting love.  And the almost immediate acquiescence after being taken felt a little unreal.  I thought there probably would have been a little more resistance with that circumstance. Nevertheless, if you are looking for a good HR novel and need something a little different, this is a great choice.  I absolutely plan to read this series and continue reading this author.  Great debut.

These shorts look fantastic on my husband.  They aren't quite as thick as your typical cargo but they still have the extra pockets.  They don't look quite as casual as them either, so you can war them with a nice shirt or with a t-shirt and it would look appropriate.  They fit well and my husband says they are very comfortable.  Good price for a good short too.

This is a great modem and it works great with Comcast.  It's fast and setup on your part is very easy.  The hard part is dealing with Comcast.  Had I not dealt with this before with Comcast I may have given up.  But I have changed about 5 modems with Comcast and doing so every single time is like pulling teeth.  When I called the agent said although this said Comcast on it, it really wasn't supported by Comcast.  This is not my first rodeo as I said so I knew to ask for a supervisor because I knew it was.  The rep then hung up on me.  I called back and the same thing happened except this time the agent transferred me to billing instead of a supervisor.  I was transferred back and the exact same thing happened once again.  After over two hours of this, I finally got an agent on the line who was competent enough to ask for help and he got the modem processed.  This is typical of Comcast service - you just expect the worst and hope it's not worse than that. So, my point is, if you have Comcast, sometimes you have to just be persistent.  When they tell you it won't work or call you stupid for thinking that it will (which happened with a previous modem), you just keep telling them it will and keep asking for someone else until you reach someone who knows what they are doing.  I changed another modem a few days ago and the first agent I spoke to was able to do it - granted she had to call me back and it took her three tries, but she worked at it until she got it and I was glad about that.  I guess it's the luck of the draw with the, but it is never fast and easy.  Please understand it has nothing to do with the brand of the modem.  I have this experience with all brands, so if this is the modem you want, you should get it  It's well priced and works fantastic.  I have owned many TP Link products and the brand is great and I've never had any reliability issues.  Definite recommend.

These bars are delicious.  The chocolate is very creamy and the almonds are unlike any almonds I've had in a chocolate bar before. I will say these arrived slightly melted although in it's own box and 2 others.  It was 96 degrees so that is why, but just be sure of the conditions where you are shipping and make sure not too hot so you don't get any melting because these bars are pretty pricey.  Those 2 things are the reason these don't get 5 stars.  If you love large, round crunchy whole almonds, these are for you.  The almonds are the heart of this product.

Oh my gosh!  I love this.  It is so so precious.  The owl is so pretty and the light is nice and soothing and the projection of moon and stars is so pretty. This is pretty much just plug in and you are set.  It is so very easy to use.  You don't need any technological skills to make this work.  It's very simple.  The music and sounds are nice and soothing.  The sound quality isn't super high quality but I still absolutely love this product.  It is a perfect gift.

Okay, so I tried this in the formula that is not labeled weight management and my very picky dog loved it.  I decided to give this a try and she loved this formula just as much.  I was shocked because she always turns her nose up at anything listed as weight management - well at most foods actually. These are a good sized can so there was plenty for her to eat as well. You can see the rice pieces along with the meat and gravy.  I can't tell any difference in appearance between this formula and the one that's not weight management - they look the same to me. The cans come with a pull top so you don't need the can opener. I'm very comfortable with feeding her this and I'm glad she loved the weight management version.

I really liked this conditioner and how soft and healthy my hair felt after I used it.  The problem is the fragrance is too strong for me.  If you don't mind the strong scent, this is a very good conditioner.  It seems as though most shampoo brands have really strengthened the level of fragrance in conditioner and it just makes it more difficult for me because I am sensitive to strong smells.  I will say this came in a bubble wrap envelope and the top had been slightly opened and some of the product leaked out.  They should probably use a box.This one gets 4 stars because the conditioner is good and most people don't have the fragrance issues that I do and that is only thing I really didn't like about the product.

I was pretty nervous about switching over my modem and router which work very well to an all in one unit.  I was afraid I would lose range and it is  always a pain to change modems with Comcast.  This one is very easy to setup and works fine with Comcast.  You just have to plan for about an hour time to get connected - 20-30 minutes of that will be waiting on hold for Comcast and then another 10 giving them information and the rest will be them processing your modem.  When it's a non-Comcast modem, they always seem to have to process it a few times.  This time was no exception - I've done this many times.  Just make sure you give them the model Archer cr700.  They will get it.  It works well and the range is even better than what I had before so I am happy.  I tested the speed and all is fine. After you set up, you may want to go to the tplinkmodem.net site to rename your network and put your own personal password in there.  I always do that. It's very easy an only takes a minute.

This is my second Slumberjack Sleeping Bag and I really like it.  The shape is good and it's roomy enough to move in if you need to.  It looks fantastic to - the color is great.  I love the head pocket as well.  The zipper is down the right side and it's easy to use.  My other bag is a 40 degree bag and it seems thicker and a little warmer.  I think this one would be fine in 40, but not 20.  One of the best features about this bag is that it is so lightweight.  It's like carrying nothing to me.  I love that!  It comes with a carrying bag and it folds up compactly.This is a great bag.

These are very pretty and great for just about any project.  They stick to glass so you can use your favorite pinterest project with your Mason jars and they will look fantastic.  There are 40 in here so there are plenty for party invitations or favors as well.  The color is an elegant beige with a thin black outline and the shape is very elegant.  These are a definite recommend.

I was excited to get to try this because I have been so interested in light healing after reading a medical study about led lights healing as well or better than antibiotics on sores on the skin.  I ended up researching more and learning how great it is for skin, pain relief and hair growth.  I actually bought a light therapy device for my face and my mom and sister ended up buying them too.  When I saw this I though it was a great idea.  Why not for plants too?  I haven't had it long enough to tell if it's as effective as is claimed but I am happy I am trying it.  I will update after I've had longer.  I will say the light itself feels very good quality and like it's made to last.  It's not like your basic flood light that you purchase at the hardware store.  I was surprised because that's what I was expecting.  Great so far - I'm excited to have this.

These are really beautiful.  The scalloped edges are so pretty and the pearlized appearance is elegant without being too pearlized - it's subtle.  This is a fair price for the 18 labels and you could put this on anything really - a gift, a project, an invitation seal.  It's thick enough to be good quality and you could put this on anything high end and it would be appropriate.  Love them!

These labels are a perfect size and are great quality. When you peel them off they don't feel like they are tearing and the texture is good and easy to write on.  I love everything about these.  You can't help but love labels like these, especially if you are always looking at sites like pinterest for great projects.  Ever since I started doing that, I have been purchasing Avery labels too because they are perfect for these projects.  The only thing I don't like about these is its price.  You get only 8 and I think you should get about twice as many for this.  However, if you must have this type, then these are great and they can be erased and reused.

These are great blocks for any child.  All of the pieces easily attach to the others and your child can build anything he or she wishes.  They are very safe and the bag provided makes for quick and easy cleanup.  I love the variation in colors.  These remind me of some of the wood ones I had as a child.  The shapes were similar and the colors as well.  I played endlessly with them and can see where these will get the same treatment. 5 Stars for affordable and creative fun.

This 2500 model is a great no frills printer that has full functionality.  It doesn't have all the bells and whistles of the higher end printers but it can do it all as far as the printing and scanning goes.  Wireless setup was easy and although installing the ink is a little different, I'm thrilled to have long lasting ink that always runs out at the most inopportune times in which you end up having to purchase it at the most expensive place.  I love the printer and what it can do.  The only reason I don't give this 5 stars is I'm still on the fence about the price.  Yes, you are prepaying for the ink at a good rate and giving yourself the  convenience of very infrequent refills, but it's still a little high.  Nevertheless, if paying that at once is okay with you, in the long run you will probably be very glad you did it.  Thinking long term, it makes sense. Oh and I printed out several pictures and the quality was fantastic so I'm happy with that.

This is an amazingly soft and very pretty throw.  If you're looking for a blanket this is not for you because it's not too large. Note the dimensions. It's great for covering up one though and it is so soft and comfortable.  It's not too think or too thick and the appearance is just as you see in the photograph.  The purples are very vibrant.  It's great to snuggle up with.

This is probably the best texture of any mousse I've ever used.  It's just the right consistency for when you need hold and volume.  It's scent is a little stronger than I prefer, but the smell is divine.  This is a little thicker than most I've used before.  At the same time, it's not too heavy so it's a definite recommend.

It took me a bit to get the hang of the wireless aspect of the drive, but once I did, it worked well.  I'm using it so I can transfer pics from my phone and store them there and transfer to my computer the ones I want.  This way I don't have to use a cloud drive and can transfer the ones I choose.  You have to download the Sandisk Connect app to your phone and go to settings for the wi-fi and change to that and it will let you transfer.  I couldn't do it while the stick was in my computer.  I took it out and then everything transferred fine and I was able to put on computer.  It transferred instantly and wasn't slow at all.  You really have to play around with it a little bit and then you can figure it out.  Once you download the app, the menu is in the upper left corner of your iPhone and you can hit that for your options.  I'm glad I have this.  It makes things quick and easy and I don't have to deal with the ever-disappearing cords.

This product has great anti-inflammatory ingredients - turmeric and and ginger.  I have a friend who is a doctor and I asked her what supplements she has seen good results with in her patients who have inflammation and she said turmeric. She did say eating foods with this would be the best but that she thought it would be a good supplement to take.  This product simply contains those and not a big list of other products.  Be careful if you have sensitive stomach but also you may ask your doctor about having inflammatory bowel issues and taking this because my friend told me people with that seemed to do well on turmeric.  I'm not sure of the effect of ginger with this issue so be careful and ask questions.  I can't tell of an effect yet because I haven't taken it long enough but I'm giving it a try.

This bag is a good, high quality and well-made canvas bag. The material seems thick (not too thick) and the seems all look to be stitched well.I originally thought the inner pockets would be able to hold a bottle of wine, but they too small for that. Good for small items like phones and wallets to keep them in an area that is easily found.The material gets pretty wrinkled when you wash it, and it does shrink up a good amount. If shrinking is something that is an issue with you, either A) don't wash it, or B) don't dry it. I also noticed that the handles on this bag don't get all twisted up like other bags do when washed. Nice!The silkscreened graphic is nice and lasts through the wash. Looks just like the images.I received a free sample of this product to evaluate and provide an unbiased and honest review. This review was written by me and of my own opinion after testing the bag. The bag being offered for free did NOT sway me in any way.

When I first opened the box I noticed a scent much like tobacco—a bit woodsy and earthy, but pleasant.I steeped this with a teaspoon of honey and a dried pineapple ring to make an amazing tea I can drink all day. I just keep adding hot water, the bag is good for a whole work day.The flavor of the tea alone is pleasant, not super strong or rich, but smooth and goes great with just about anything I am eating. Doesn't seem to interfere with my tastebuds either.The box comes with 2 pillow bags of tea bags, so you only actually open up 50% of the tea at a time. It does not have that waxed paper type wrapper insert some other teas have.If you are looking for a tea you can drink all day, I highly recommend this one for the flavor and fact it doesn't have caffeine.I received a free sample of this product to evaluate and provide an unbiased and honest review. This review was written by me and of my own opinion after testing the tea. The tea being offered for free did NOT sway me in any way.

Wow, this thing is a bit larger than I anticipated! But, overall, a 20000mAh battery is a pretty awesome thing to have as a backup for multiple devices or numerous charges.This is one of the first battery backups that I have had that wrote out the percentage on the battery indicators. Most just have 4 blue LEDs. This has them too, but also states "25%", "50%", and so on next to them.To charge it up takes a few hours, or more, depending on how discharged it is when you plug it in. Again, it's a 20000mAh battery, so that is to be expected.The device itself feels solid with no rattling or moving parts. I haven't dropped it yet, but the plastic feels like it may crack if dropped on concrete. It's not very 'rubbery' feeling—you know, the type of plastic that feels like it won't shatter on impact.The instructions are basic, in very tiny print, and with many typos/grammatical errors. You can figure it out on your own, or using the instructions. If you have a major difficulty with all electronics, then the instructions may be tough for you to follow. Not sure why they have to be so small when the device is so big—they certainly have a lot of room left in the box.I also noticed that there was no mention of what the lightening bolt icon means on the back of the device. I had to look on the Amazon detail page for this product to figure it out. It shows you what port is for the Quick Charge 2.0 feature that some phones have.Works well with iPhone 6. I did not get the dreaded message stating it was incompatible, so that's good. It seems to charge my phone quickly (using the Quick Charge port.)I never felt the device get hot or even warm during charging.Great for:— camping— RVs and travel— emergency kits— events and meetupsI received a free sample of this product to evaluate and provide an unbiased and honest review. This review was written by me and of my own opinion after testing the battery. The battery being offered for free did NOT sway me in any way.

This is my third LED filament style bulb now. I love the style the filaments and fact that they burn much cooler than CFLs and especially incandescents.The other Bright Innovations "torpedo shaped" bulb had large numbers stamped on the bottom of the bulb, about 1/4-inch tall in black ink, making it a bit odd in an exposed application. THIS bulb does not have those numbers, making it a nicer option for exposed applications.The light it emits is very nice. I have this in a Chardonnay bottle with the bottom cut off, and the light is very warm and pleasant. As a bare bulb it's a great, bright light for any room. If you are used to glaring white, almost blue type lighting, then this will be a huge difference for you—it's a nice warm yellow light.I received a free sample of this product to evaluate and provide an unbiased and honest review. This review was written by me and of my own opinion after testing the bulb. The bulb being offered for free did NOT sway me in any way.

This is a great headlamp! The straps are nice and snug, not too tight. Fits over a ball cap easily. Wearing it for hours on end may get a bit uncomfortable for some.The light itself has a semi-smooth, almost slightly rubbery feel to it. It is not a slick surface. The weight of it is actually pretty comfortable, considering it has 3 AAA batteries in there. Without them, it's super lightweight.The hinge on the light make some really loud clicking sounds when you adjust it. Maybe not the best for a hunting or quite situation. In that case: set it and forget it.The light is bright, but not 'super' or 'ultra' bright. This is great for short to medium distances, such as hobbies, close quarters, and tight spaces where a super bright light can be blinding. Though it works great outdoors as a guide light.I received a sample of this product at a discount to evaluate and provide an unbiased and honest review. This review was written by me and of my own opinion after testing the headlamp. The headlamp being offered for free did NOT sway me in any way.

These are a great replacement set of earbuds to those that come with your electronic devices these days.First thing I noticed was that the labels for right ("R") and left ("L") were REALLY hard to find—they are on the little rubber mount between the cable and earbud.. Once I learned that the earbuds tend to point forward when held, I no longer needed the labels.Second, you will likely have to split the cable a bit more. When I put these on they barely reached my ears. Just gently separate the wires near where they are sealed together.The sound is really good. I did have to go into my EQ on my phone to boost the bass up a bit (on an iPhone 6). It sounds clear and not tinny or flat. Once I had it on "bass booster" or "rock" it sounded good.For me, the default ear cups are too big, so I used the smaller ones that were provided and they fit great. Easy to install too. Three sizes included.The cord is plenty long enough to have my phone in my pocket and earbuds in-ear. The jack on the cord is not to wide, so it should fit with most cases on your phone.Not sure what "Adoric High Performance model" means in the description on this page. I looked "Adoric" up but can't find anything mentioning it. Either a typo or marketing speak.Description also mentions "Music, video playback and volume control". Music, sure, it plays that. "Video playback"?? Sure, the audio of it, but there is no video playback feature. And volume control is NOT a feature of these headphones. There is no volume control on the cord or anywhere. This entire line appears to be a typo.Great for music, podcasts, movies, and more.I received a free sample of this product to evaluate and provide an unbiased and honest review. This review was written by me and of my own opinion after testing the earbuds with an iPhone 6. The earbuds being offered for free did NOT sway me in any way.

These are amazing! I have the original battery that came with my Hubsan X4, which I believe is a 240 or 380mAh battery. The X4's battery is also half the physical size of these batteries, so I thought I was out of luck. BUT they work!The connector (a "micro losi connector") and voltage on this battery is the exact same as the Hubsan X4's battery, so it works perfectly. The only problem is that the battery is too big to fit inside the X4, so I rubber-banded it to the bottom. The battery fits the clearance between bottom of the shell and a flat surface perfectly. With the rubber bands they hit the flat surface and lift the feet up a bit, so some thin double-sided tape should do the trick if you charge in place (and don't crash.)The flight time on this battery was insane! It was double the OEM Hubsan battery! I was guessing that the added battery weight would negate the added mAh of the battery, but I was wrong. I flew for almost 20 mins—LEDs on, in a good breeze, at 60-degree temps, in an obstacle environment. So awesome!While I state that I loaded up my Hubsan X4 with these, I am not sure what the added weight does to the life of the motors. I do know that I was deeply surprised that it only slightly affected the flight controls and lift of the X4. After a few mins of flying it I forgot about any diminished maneuverability/lift. I did, however, notice that decent was a lot faster and found myself full-throttling it more often than usual a quick decent.I received a free sample of this product to evaluate and provide an unbiased and honest review.
